name: Epic Basketball
description:
Epic Basketball is a fun and quirky street-style sports game you can play right in your browser. It's all about how many baskets you can sink in just 60 seconds. If a basketball shootout game sounds too easy, think again because this hoop doesn't like to stay in one spot, and distractions are everywhere. Stay sharp, aim true, and shoot your shot!

Controls

  • Desktop: Hold down the left mouse button, drag to aim, and release to shoot.
  • Mobile: Tap and drag on the screen to set your angle release to launch the ball.

How to Play Epic Basketball

  • You start by picking your player. At first, you'll play as Javi, a funky street baller with big hair and big dreams.
  • Once you're on the court, you'll face a single hoop. You have 60 seconds to begin with. Your goal is to score as many points as possible before time runs out.
  • Scoring isn't the only challenge. Each time you make a basket, the hoop moves. Sometimes farther, sometimes higher. You'll have to adjust your aim and force. The game uses a dotted arc to help you plan your shot, but mastering the rhythm takes practice.
  • A small extra hoop sometimes appears on the screen. If you score while it's active, you get bonus time!

Unlock Epic Basketball Players

Start with Javi and unlock more colorful players like Plin Plin, Bubu, Patty Wally, Bruce, Alien, Neil, Imhotep and more. Each character has their own personality and look, but the real prize is Nona. She may look like a grandma, but she's the ultimate baller. To unlock Nona, you'll need to score 300 points. That's not easy, so get practicing!

Next Play

If you enjoyed Epic Basketball's energy and fun visuals, you'll love playing Basket Random. It's a 2-player basketball game with pixel characters and fast matches. Great for when you want to take your skills to an even funnier court with wicked physics.

name: Geometry Vibes X-Ball
description:
Geometry Vibes: X-Ball is a pulse-pounding platformer where you guide a neon ball through treacherous obstacle courses with just one button. Master the simple yet addictive tap-and-release mechanics to navigate deadly spikes, sharp slopes, and tight corridors in this modern tribute to classic Geometry Dash games.

Controls

  • Tap/Hold: Move upwards
  • Release: Flip direction

Game Modes

Classic Mode

10 progressively challenging levels with precision platforming and instant-death obstacles.

Race Mode

2-4 player local multiplayer chaos on shared keyboard - last ball standing wins!

Endless Mode

Test your endurance as speed increases indefinitely - how far can you go?

Challenge Mode

5 brutally difficult levels for expert players seeking ultimate bragging rights.

Features

  • 4 addictive game modes
  • 25+ challenging levels
  • Customizable ball skins
  • 4-player local multiplayer
  • 6 language support

Experience the ultimate one-button platformer today at OnlineGames.io!

name: Car Parking City Duel
description:
Car Parking City Duel is a free online driving game where you can play solo or on split-screen with a friend. It features a 3D open-world city with realistic driving physics and multiple game modes: racing, drifting, crashing, timed missions, and free exploration. This car game combines various driving challenges into one exciting package.

Controls

Player 1

  • Move: WASD
  • Switch Camera: C
  • NOS: Left Shift
  • Brake: Space
  • Restart: R
  • Look Back: T

Player 2

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Switch Camera: K
  • NOS: O
  • Brake: P
  • Restart: U
  • Look Back: L

Game Modes

Race Mode

Compete against friends on 10 unique tracks with tight corners and city traffic. Perfect your NOS boosts to win!

Missions

20 challenging parking scenarios requiring precision and timing. Watch your health bar!

Crash Mode

Earn points by smashing cars - the more destruction, the higher your score!

Drift Mode

Maintain high-speed drifts around corners to rack up points and show your skills.

Key Features

  • ‚úì 7 diverse game modes
  • ‚úì Split-screen multiplayer
  • ‚úì Unlockable car collection
  • ‚úì Realistic physics
  • ‚úì Detailed 3D city
  • ‚úì Multiple languages

Developed by RHM Interactive, specialists in competitive browser games. Try more traffic games and parking games on OnlineGames.io!

name: Ultimate Moto
description:
Does gaming feel overwhelming lately? Big-budget titles flood us with complex controls, hundreds of features, and graphics so detailed they're exhausting to follow. Sometimes you end up feeling stressed just trying to keep up instead of feeling relaxed.

In all that noise, what many of us truly crave is the simplicity of arcade mechanics. Think of Pac-Man. Pure addictive fun that stands for decades. When the core is fun, the game doesn't need a fancy package. So sometimes, the best online games are the ones that are easy on the eyes, quick to learn, and instantly fun to play.

Ultimate Moto was created exactly with this kind of mentality. This game strips gaming back down to the basics with its minimalist neon visuals, sharp and clean lines, and easy mechanics. Forget 5 different kinds of in-game coins, menus packed with hundreds of confusing options, endless tutorials, or overly complex storylines. Here, it's all about getting right onto the neon-lit track and controlling your bike with arrow keys. And enjoying smooth jumps and satisfying flips.

If you're looking for a break from the gaming clutter, Ultimate Moto provides what you've been looking for. This fun little game throws you into a glowing track full of loops, ramps, and sparkly gems to collect. Choose your bike, upgrade your engine, and zoom through challenging levels with style. Each level is a new obstacle course, and your goal is to stay upright on the bike. Hit start, speed ahead, and reach the finish line without crashing.

How to Play Ultimate Moto

Your mission is to reach the finish line without tipping over. Along the way, grab as many diamonds as you can. These gems are your currency to buy new bikes and engine upgrades. Each level gets a bit trickier, with steeper hills, longer jumps, and tighter timing. If you flip in the air, you get an extra three diamonds. And if you crash, just restart instantly and try that level again.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Developer

Ultimate Moto is developed by FreezeNova Games and released in 2021.

More Free Bike Games to Try

If Ultimate Moto brings back that feeling for you, let us know! Drop a comment, tell us how far you've made it, or which neon bike is your favorite. We'd love to hear your thoughts. And if you enjoyed Ultimate Moto, have a look at the other free bike games we have on OnlineGames.io. We publish new games each week. So bookmark this site and don't miss out on new games.

name: GT Cars City Racing
description:
GT Cars City Racing is an exhilarating 3D driving adventure featuring split-screen multiplayer, GT supercars, and explosive sandbox mayhem! Race through Toy City's physics playground with wild mini-games: demolish robots, launch into pools, collect diamonds, and topple buildings. Compete in Face to Face races where your car changes every lap, or survive the Mega Ramps time trial against a destructive robot. Fully customize your ride with paint jobs, neon effects, and rim colors.

Controls

Player 1

  • Move: WASD
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Repair: R
  • Camera: C

Player 2

  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Nitro: N
  • Repair: U
  • Camera: K

Game Modes

Toy City Sandbox

A vibrant playground with 7+ physics-based challenges:

  • üí• Smash giant robots
  • üèä‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Ramp jumps into pools
  • üè¢ Topple building dominoes
  • üíé Collect floating diamonds
  • üåà Fly through rainbow rings
  • üéà Explode balloon crates
  • üé≥ Bowling pin carnage

Face to Face

5-lap race with vehicle swaps each lap - adapt to win!

Mega Ramps

Time trial with ramp jumps while dodging a killer robot!

Customization

  • üé® 50+ paint colors
  • ‚ú® Neon rim effects
  • üí® Custom nitro trails
  • üîÆ Glowing windows

By GameVGames - masters of arcade racing madness! Try our other hit: Crazy Car Arena for more stunt-driving chaos!

name: The Smurfs Cooking
description:
The Smurfs are back, and this time, they are in the kitchen! The Smurfs Cooking is a fun cooking game where you help Chef Smurf whip up the best cupcakes and snacks for the annual Smurf Food Festival. But he's in a bit of a smurfy pickle - he hasn't thought of a recipe yet! So it's up to you to jump behind the counter, serve hungry Smurfs, and keep the food flowing before the timer runs out.

If you love cooking games or just want to hang out with your favorite little blue friends, this sweet challenge will have you hooked. Muffins, whipped cream, juice, and cupcakes... it's all here!

Controls

  • Mouse/Touch: Tap or click to select ingredients, drag them to the plate, or serve Smurfs.

How to Play The Smurfs Cooking

  • Complete levels by serving food and earning berries. Smurfs show dessert orders above their heads - muffins (plain/with toppings) or drinks.
  • Pour batter into the oven to bake muffins (don't let them burn!), then add toppings to match orders exactly.
  • Serve quickly before Smurfs get impatient! Earn berries to pass levels (e.g. 160 berries for Level 5).
  • Unlock boosters/upgrades like time extenders or auto-serve helpers as you progress.

Pro Chef Tips

  • Keep ovens busy - idle time is your enemy!
  • Prioritize impatient Smurfs with shortest patience bars.
  • Memorize topping-plate combos to work faster.
  • Watch videos for bonus rewards and spend sugar cubes wisely.

Features

  • Vibrant 3D graphics with original Smurf characters
  • Dozens of increasingly challenging levels
  • Charming cooking animations & sounds
  • Kid-friendly yet engaging gameplay
  • Multiple language support & unlockable power-ups

Officially licensed Smurfs game by IMPS/Peyo. Try The Smurfs Village Cleaning next!

name: Sword Play Ninja Slice Runner
description:
Grab your katana and get ready to slice your way through waves of enemies! Sword Play Ninja Slice Runner is an action runner game where you become a blade-wielding ninja on a high platform filled with enemies. You'll be slicing flying shurikens, bullets, shields or dodging massive bullets, just with your fingers moving. The game throws you into a simple but colorful 3D world that changes in each level. Complete sword fights, slicing action, and enjoy satisfying slow-motion effects. It's a mix of Fruit Ninja's slicing satisfaction and the fun of endless runners.

Controls

  • Swipe on the screen to slash enemies and obstacles.
  • Hold and drag to control your sword's direction.
  • Timing and precision are everything!

How to Play Sword Play Ninja Slice Runner Online

  • Start running down a path filled with enemies.
  • As you move, swipe to slice through foes who rush at you with weapons.
  • Time your moves to dodge traps like swinging axes or bullets.
  • Finish each level by defeating the final enemy or completing a stylish slow-motion slash.
  • Shielded enemies who need multiple hits.
  • Special weapons like dual katanas or energy blades.
  • Satisfying cinematic slow-mo kills that make you feel like a true ninja.

Customize Your Blade and Style Your Swings

One of the coolest parts of Sword Play! Ninja Slice Runner is the wide range of sword skins and trail effects you can unlock in the shop. They make your slicing feel even more fun and rewarding.

Sword Skins

You can unlock random swords with 700 coins or collect specific ones by leveling up or completing challenges:

  • A jagged flame-shaped sword (your default)
  • A giant black cleaver
  • A sci-fi energy blade (pixel-style!)
  • A chainsaw sword for intense slicing
  • A key-shaped sword (unlock it with keys from gameplay)
  • Even a hockey stick or a curved fantasy bow at higher levels

Sword Trails

Leave a mark, literally. These visual effects make every attack more exciting:

  • Smooth white arcs or star-studded slashes
  • Bubble trails or lightning-style swings
  • Colorful effects like glowing pink trails (unlocked at level 10)
  • Fiery orange swings (unlocked at level 20)

Tip: Trails make every hit more stylish and VR-like experience!

Developer

Sword Play! Ninja Slice Runner game was developed by PlayGama for quick fun.

More Ninja Games Await

If you're craving more stealthy swordplay, check out Blocky Parkour Ninja or browse our ninja games collection.

name: Red Light Green Light
description:
Red Light Green Light is a game from the famous TV series Squid Game, and it is definitely one of the most iconic scenes. In this children game, players stand behind a starting line and must reach a finish line at the far end of the field. A giant, creepy doll stands at the finish line. It turns its back to the players and says "Green light!" This means players can move. Then, when it suddenly says "Red light!" and turns around. And players must freeze immediately. If the doll sees someone still moving during "Red light," that player is eliminated (and in Squid Game, elimination is done by shooting the player).

In this online video game version of Red Light Green Light on OnlineGames.io, you'll be put in the tracksuit of a numbered contestant and dropped into a deadly playground. Movement can mean either survival or death. Nothing in between. So hit the play button and enjoy the same thrill 456 lived in the first episode!

Controls

  • PC:
    • Hold the Left Mouse Button or Spacebar to run
    • Release to stop when the doll turns
  • Mobile:
    • Tap and hold to move, release to stop

How to Play Red Light Green Light

  • Start by entering your name to join the round.
  • Line up with dozens of other players, all dressed in green tracksuits with their unique numbers.
  • When the doll looks away, run toward the red line by tapping and holding. The moment she turns back release the tap and freeze instantly.
  • If you get caught moving during "Red Light," and you're eliminated on the spot.
  • Make it to the finish line within the time limit to win and play the next round until you win the big prize.
  • If you want to stand out from the crowd, unlock different hats and headgears in the shop.

Tips & Tricks for Red Light, Green Light

  • Watch the doll's head closely; her body starts turning a second before she says, "Red Light."
  • Stay calm when the timer is close to running out. Panic leads to mistakes.
  • Don't try to sprint the whole way. Stop-start rhythm is your best strategy.
  • Save up your coins to unlock cool hats that make your player stand out!

Developer

This game is a fan-made experience created in the spirit of Squid Game, designed for quick, casual fun. With a clean design and responsive movement, it's easy to pick up and play on your browser.

Similar Games

If you liked the tension and timing of Red Light Green Light, check out Squid Shooter on OnlineGames.io. It brings the Squid Game characters with a goofy style. Feel free to explore all other popular free games on our site.

name: Apocalypse Truck
description:
When the virus hit, cities crumbled, people vanished. The world went silent except for the groans of the undead. You're one of the few survivors of zombie apocalypse. Your only hope is a beat-up monster truck, with some spikes, plates, and just enough horsepower to push through the zombie chaos. This is your last chance to escape the city ruins. Fuel up, slam the pedal, and drive through waves of the undead in this thrilling side-scrolling zombie survival game!

Apocalypse Truck is a 2D driving game where you roam in a post apocalypse town, run over zombies and race to the finish line. Besides surviving the zombie apocalypse with wheels, spikes you will also launch off wrecked cars, perform mid air flips and and grab coins as you go. Are you into monster truck flips? Destruction? Flattening some zombies? Ok, don't wait! Start playing this fun game on our browser.

Controls

  • ‚Üí Arrow keys / WASD: Drive and balance your truck
  • ‚Üí Mouse: Tap through menus or select levels
  • ‚Üí Mobile players can use touch buttons to control the truck.

How to Play Apocalypse Truck

  • ‚Üí Start by selecting the first level on the locked map. Levels unlock as you progress.
  • ‚Üí Your goal is to reach the finish line without losing all your health.
  • ‚Üí Use the arrow keys to accelerate and balance your truck on rough terrain. Jump the car using the up arrow or W key.
  • ‚Üí Zombies will be in your way; run them over for fun and coin rewards.
  • ‚Üí Perform front or back flips during big jumps to earn 3 bonus coins for each one.
  • ‚Üí If your truck lands upside down and stays flipped, your health bar drains fast. Don't panic; press the up arrow and maneuver to flip back quickly!
  • ‚Üí Gather coins on the road. These coins let you unlock cooler and stronger trucks from the garage.
  • ‚Üí Replay levels to collect more coins and master your flips.

Features

  • ‚Üí Post-apocalyptic side-scrolling action
  • ‚Üí Waves of zombies to crush under your tires
  • ‚Üí 30+ levels
  • ‚Üí 5 brutal trucks in garage
  • ‚Üí Flip bonus mechanic
  • ‚Üí Truck health bar system

Developer

Apocalypse Truck is developed by FreezeNova. They're known for making fast and fun games that play great in your browser.

Other Zombie Games Online You'll Enjoy

If you loved running over zombies in Apocalypse Truck, it's time to switch gears and try a slower but deadlier style. Try Zombie Sniper. In this 2D shooting game, you take your position on a rooftop with a sniper rifle and aim for zombie heads. Each shot needs to be perfect. With 30 levels of zombie action, it's a different kind of zombie game online!

name: PacXon New Realms
description:
Remember Paxcon? The classic wall-closing puzzle from the 2000s? If the answer is a big yes, the wait is over my friend, because PacXon: New Realms is here now. And it's out and bolder than ever. In this sequel to arcade classic PacXon Deluxe, with a full-on expansion loaded with new realms, enemies, skins, and power-ups, you'll get that pixelated fun with a modern twist.

Conquer by drawing walls, dodge tricky mines, and carve out territory with style. It's part strategy, part action, and all satisfying (especially when you trap those pesky enemies in a corner and watch the progress bar tick up to 80%.) In case you're new to world of PacXon, here's a quick Arcade 101 refresher:

What is PacXon?

PacXon (sometimes written as Pac-Xon) is a fun arcade-style puzzle game that mixes mechanics from classic games like Pac-Man and Xonix. In this fun game, you play as Pacxon, a little PacMan-like character, but instead of eating dots, your goal is to fill up the screen by building walls. As you move, Pacxon leaves a trail behind him. If you can successfully close off a section of the screen, that area becomes filled in. The goal is to fill at least 80% of the screen to complete the level. PacXon was originally a Flash game released in 2007, but 18 years later, an HTML5 version was published so it can be played online without plugins.

Controls

  • Arrow keys/ drag mouse: Move PacXon in four directions
  • Mouse swipe: For touchscreen and drag-based input

How to Play PacXon: New Realms

Your goal is to capture at least 80% of the field to move on. Yellow dots are shared open spaces, and orange dots are your territory. At the beginning of the level, all four sides are yours. You will run over open space to create a wall trail and loop back to a captured area to close the trail and claim that section. Then, it will turn into orange dots, marking your territory.

If an enemy touches you or your trail before you finish the loop, you lose a life. Keep track of your lives on the bottom left. Keep an eye on the progress bar at the top to know how close you are to finishing the level.

Types of Enemies

Each level features ghostly enemies with different movement patterns. You'll need to study their patterns and strike at the right moment to grab territory without losing lives.

  • Blue enemies: Move diagonally in captured zones.
  • Pink enemies: Move diagonally in open space.
  • Red enemies: The most aggressive: they move diagonally and destroy the walls you've built.

Grab Power-Ups

Collect sweet treats on the map for powerful boosts:

  • üç¨ (Candy): Eat enemies temporarily
  • üç© (Donut): Speed boost
  • üç∞ (Cake): Enemies move slower
  • üßÅ (Cupcake): Enemies freeze for a short time

PacXon New Realms Features

  • 192 handcrafted levels across 4 distinct environments
  • Revamped UI with cleaner menus and game flow
  • Pixel-style visuals with adorable animations
  • New soundtrack with upbeat tunes for every zone
  • Character skins to unlock: 4 to 6 per world!
  • Enemies with unique AI patterns
  • Playable on desktop or mobile with intuitive controls

Developer

PacXon: New Realms is the official sequel to the beloved PacXon Deluxe. This upgraded version brings back the old-school challenge with a fresh look. It's distributed by Azerion Casual Games. You can play it online for free now at OnlineGames.io.

What to Play Next?

Love the blend of retro vibes and quick reactions? Try Pac-Man 30th Anniversary. It's a faithful tribute to the dot-munching, ghost-dodging original, now updated for browser play. It's perfect for fans of maze strategies and classic tension. Google PacMan is a full-blown pixel quest that's equal parts nostalgic and new. Play now!

name: Crazy Motorcycle
description:
If Minecraft ever had a wild cousin who ditched mining for motorbikes, Crazy Motorcycle would be it. In this crazy bike game, you'll take a Minecraft-style noob (we call him Nubik), give him a shiny motorcycle, and drop into a floating obstacle course in the sky. There are no roads, no rules, and definitely no safety rails. Just pure blocky platformer. That's the energy this game brings.

It's almost like a kid built a racetrack in creative mode, added a few too many stone walls and trees, and then dared you to race through it with a bike. You'll recognize the pixelated grass blocks, chunky trees, mossy stone pillars, ice blocks and floating islands. Even though the theme feels like it's pulled straight out of a Minecraft server, there's no building or mining mode here. Your job is to dodge, jump, and reach the red portal at the end of the level. And there's something extra funny about seeing this square-headed daredevil wipe out in the most dramatic ways. So start playing Crazy Motorcycle now, and then you'll want to play again and again.

Controls

PC:

  • Move: W / A / S / D or Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Spacebar

Mobile:

  • Use the on-screen joystick and buttons to steer and jump.

How to Play Crazy Motorcycle

  • Your mission is to drive the noob to the red portal block without crashing.
  • Each level is a floating track in the sky. If you fall off, you'll start from the last flag.
  • You'll face tight turns, sudden jumps, moving obstacles and a forest of stone pillars and trees.
  • Drive carefully without crashing your bike. The red target cube marks your finish line. Touch it to complete the level and unlock the next challenge.

Developer

Crazy Motorcycle is a browser-based platformer game built by AM-Games. If you've played other "Noob" or voxel racing titles, you'll feel right at home. The developers focused on making a challenging but playful experience with short levels and instant retries.

More Platformer Games You'll Love

If Crazy Motorcycle grabbed your attention, try Obby But You're on a Bike. It's another sky adventure where you ride and jump and try not to fall off platforms. But this time, it has a Roblox-inspired theme instead of Minecraft. Perfect if you enjoy stunt games with a side of comedy.

name: Kick the Pirate
description:
Ahoy matey! Pirates may be brave on the high seas, but they've never met you. In Kick the Pirate, your job is simple: turn this grumpy pirate into your personal punching bag. He's muttering curses or just standing there looking smug. But it's oddly satisfying to send him flying with a cannonball. Seriously. Bad day at school? Boss annoyed you? This destroy game is the perfect way to blow off some steam without flipping a table.

Stress-Busting Clicker Game

Some games make you think. Others make you feel. And this one? It just lets you kick a pirate with a cannon. And honestly, that's all we needed today. In case you still have some steam left to blow off, we have a full collection of dummy games. You can kick the alien who tries to colonize your planet with some laser guns and sci-fi weapons. Or perhaps you may want to beat an Evil Santa who keeps the gifts to himself instead of giving them away. Oh, you still need more? Write "Kick the" in the search bar or go and explore all destroying games we have!

Controls

  • Click or tap to attack the pirate.
  • Use earned coins to unlock more weapons.
  • Toggle settings in the top right for sound and blood effects.

How to Play Kick the Pirate

  • Start by clicking or tapping the pirate as fast (or as furiously) as you like.
  • Each hit earns you coins, which you'll use to buy new weapons.
  • Your goal is to deplete the pirate's health bar (at the bottom) to complete each level.
  • As you progress, the levels get tougher and the pirate gets sassier.
  • You can swap out the ship's background if you want a change of scene.
  • Toggle off blood splatter for less graphic visuals.

Weapons to Try

Unlock wacky weapons, each more satisfying than the last:

  • Flintlock Pistol: Classic and simple.
  • Bone Key Gun: Straight from a cursed treasure chest.
  • Battle Axe: Heavy damage and major pirate pain.
  • Ship Anchor: Watch him go flying.
  • Cannon: Boom! Need we say more?
  • TNT Barrel: Great for pirate control.
  • Rifle: Unlockable after brutal beating.

Developer

Developed by FreezeNova with casual fun in mind - perfect for quick sessions or all-out pirate punishment marathons.

Is Kick the Pirate Safe for Kids?

While using cartoon-style visuals (with optional blood effects), the gameplay revolves around exaggerated pirate violence. Recommended for players 10+ with parental guidance if needed.

name: Julie Beauty Salon
description:
Julie Beauty Salon is a glam up makeover game where you run a beauty salon. Every makeover is a mini masterpiece in this fun, stylish browser game. You're a beauty expert in charge of transforming a fabulous girl with bold makeup, trendy hairstyles, and colorful manicures. If you've ever dreamed of being a stylist or just love mixing and matching beauty looks, this free game is perfect for you.

Controls

  • Click or tap to select makeup tools, hairstyles, and nail polish.

How to Play Julie Beauty Salon

  • Complete unique beauty routines one by one: makeup, hair styling, and nail art for three different girls.
  • Start by selecting the first part from the intro screen. Our girl needs a full transformation!

Start with Makeup

  • Pick a lipstick, swipe on colorful blush, and choose stylish eyelashes from the right panel. Want soft glam or bold drama? You decide!
  • If you complete the makeup, move on to the next level: hair makeover!
  • Give your client a fresh new hairstyle. You can switch cuts, change colors (even go two-tone like pink and blue), and make them shine!
  • If she looks happy with the end result of her hair, next is NAILS!

Manicure & Nail Art

  • Make the manicure, and apply nail polish. Then add some glitter, french tips of your preferred color or some other nail art options.
  • Finish it off with rings, bracelets or watches to complete the look.
  • Once you've styled all three parts, you'll see green checkmarks on each portrait, meaning your job is done! Take a screenshot of your makeover and share it with friends! If you want, you can always press the refresh button to go wild with new looks.

Developer

Julie Beauty Salon is created by FreezeNova Games.

Is Julie Beauty Salon safe for kids?

Yes! Julie Beauty Salon is a kid-friendly makeover game with no violence or inappropriate content. It's perfect game for kids who enjoy fashion and creativity.

Love Beauty & Makeover Games?

Check out Princess Beauty Salon for another glow-up adventure. It features royalty-level glam, extra makeup tools, and even dress-up options for those who want to take styling even further.

name: Tunnel Road
description:
Tunnel Road is a 3D avoid game where you navigate in a sci-fi, spinning tunnel full of twists, turns, and sudden obstacles. It's all about surviving as long as you can. The game starts off manageable. But, as the tempo picks up, so does the pressure. If you hit an obstacle, you're back at level 1... unless you choose to use one of your limited revivals. It's a kind of game that pulls you in and doesn't let go.

Since the early days of browser arcades, tunnel games have been around with us. They take inspiration from classic endless runners and even some retro sci-fi games where you fly through wormholes. But Tunnel Road takes that concept and gives it a slick, colorful makeover with smooth controls, randomized levels and competitive 2-player support. So, it is a pure test of your reflexes wrapped up in a brand new package. Smoother than ever before. Let's start our journey in the wormhole!

Controls

1-Player Mode:

  • Move left: Press A or Left Arrow
  • Move right: Press D or Right Arrow

2-Player Mode:

  • Player 1: A / D
  • Player 2: Left / Right Arrows

How to Play Tunnel Road

Start by choosing whether you want to play alone or against a friend. Once you're in, your only goal is simple: stay alive. Your ball speeds forward through a swirling tunnel filled with unexpected blockades and gaps. You must steer left or right to dodge everything in your path.

Each time you complete a run, you progress to a new level, but hit just one obstacle and you're forced to restart from level 1. That is unless you opt to revive with an ad and keep your streak going.

The real challenge is keeping up with the speed. It increases little by little, pushing your limits. No power-ups, no invincibility, no brakes and definitely no slow motion. It's just you, your reflexes and the tunnel ahead...

Explore Tunnel Road With a Friend

Tunnel Road gets even more exciting when you bring in a second player. In 2-player mode, both players race through the same tunnel side by side. The goal is to stay alive longer than your opponent. You and your friend will each control a separate ball on your half of the screen, dodging obstacles in parallel tunnels. If one player crashes, the other player instantly wins the round. To start the game, select 2-Player Mode from the main menu. The screen will split vertically Player 1 plays on the left, Player 2 on the right. Player 1 uses A (left) and D (right). First one to crash loses the round!

Developer

Tunnel Road was developed by gamevgames. The game's design blends traditional endless tunnel racing with modern arcade polish. It runs smoothly in your browser.

Other Skill Games to Play Online

name: Thief Puzzle
description:
Thief Puzzle is a funny and clever story puzzle game where you play as a sneaky thief with one superpower: a stretchy arm that can reach almost anything! His arm is so elastic that he can even hug the Statue of Liberty. But getting what you want isn't easy. You'll have to sneak past traps, dodge obstacles, and avoid setting off wild chain reactions just to grab your prize, which is sometimes a bag of groceries and sometimes a precious diamond ring.

Every level is like a mini cartoon with stickmen. You'll get funny animations whether you win or fail. Want to yank a treasure chest away from a pirate? Or snatch a suitcase in front of the Eiffel Tower while a tourist takes selfies? This free online game is packed with silly scenarios that will keep you laughing through every challenge.

Controls

  • On PC: Click and drag the thief's arm toward the object
  • On mobile: Touch and drag anywhere on the screen
  • Release to let go when you reach your target

How to Play Thief Puzzle

Your goal in each level is simple: grab the item. But the way you get there is anything but simple. There are traps, angry characters, fire hydrants, TNT barrels, and all kinds of objects that can ruin your perfect heist. Touch the wrong thing, and it's game over with a funny twist.

Reveal Funny Stories at Each Level

What really makes Thief Puzzle stand out is the way each level feels like a little story. You're not just solving puzzles, but you're living through short, animated scenes. And the good news is there are 400 levels with unique stories.

In one level, you're in Paris trying to grab a suitcase. But there's a fire hydrant, a red balloon, and a tourist in the way. Get it wrong, and you'll fly through the air in cartoon-style chaos.

Another time, you'll stretch across a pirate ship, sneaking past TNT barrels and a dozing captain just to reach a golden treasure chest.

Some levels turn into mini detective tales like the museum level, where you have to quietly reach past a statue to swipe a thief's loot without anyone noticing. And you'll blame him for stealing the loots. Lol!

There's even a scene in a park, where a character is about to propose. The twist? You're stealing the engagement ring from the hopeful romantic!

Each level gets harder, with crazier setups and more things to watch out for. One moment you're just dodging a dog. The next, you're dealing with lasers, guards, or lovers in a dramatic moment. With 400 levels, the game keeps surprising you with new scenes, jokes, and challenges.

Failures Are Part of the Fun

Even when you lose, the game rewards you with a funny scene. It might be a slapstick fall, an explosion, or an awkward interruption that makes you laugh. You'll probably replay some levels just to see what happens when things go wrong.

Other Funny Games You'll Love

If you enjoyed the silly situations and fail animations in Thief Puzzle, you should definitely check out Henry Stickmin: Stealing the Diamond. It's another free online game full of wild choices, surprising outcomes, and hilarious story paths. Just like Thief Puzzle, it's all about experimenting, laughing at the results, and finding clever ways to succeed (or fail in style). In both funny games, each level feels like a sketch from a comedy show, where anything can happen and usually does.

Is Thief Puzzle safe for kids?

Thief Puzzle is generally safe for kids over the age of 5. It features cartoon-style visuals, silly humor, and no realistic violence or harmful content. The gameplay is light-hearted and focused on solving creative puzzles through trial and error. However, parents should be aware that the main character is a thief, and the goal of each level is to steal objects (sometimes in sneaky or deceptive ways.) While the game presents this in a humorous and exaggerated cartoon manner, it's still important to talk with younger players about the difference between game logic and real-world behavior. Being clever is fun, but stealing isn't right. As long as younger audiences understand this, Thief Puzzle can be a fun and harmless game that encourages problem-solving and creative thinking without showing any violent materials.

Can I play Thief Puzzle for free?

Yes! You can play Thief Puzzle online for free at OnlineGames.io. No download or sign-up is needed.

How many levels does Thief Puzzle have?

There are 400 levels, each with its own unique setup, story, and puzzle to solve.

Do I need to be good at puzzles to enjoy it?

Not at all! Thief Puzzle is made for everyone. Some levels are tricky, but the fun is in experimenting. You'll learn as you play.

Can I play Thief Puzzle on mobile?

Yes. You can play it on both desktop and mobile browsers at OnlineGames.io with full touch support.

description:

How to Play Pyramid Solitaire

Begin at the top layers (cards at the bottom). Only uncovered cards can be matched. Match pairs to 13.

Kings are 13 by themselves, Queens are 12, Jacks are 11, and all number cards are at face value. You can match cards of any color. For example, 5‚ô• and 7‚ô£.

Possible Combinations

  • King (13)
  • Queen (12) + Ace (1)
  • Jack (11) + 2
  • 10 + 3
  • 9 + 4
  • 8 + 5
  • 7 + 6

Play strategically to uncover all pyramid cards. If no matches, click the deck to draw. You can go through the deck multiple times. Clear as many pyramid cards as possible. When choosing between matches, pick the one that exposes more covered cards.

More Free Card Games

If you enjoy Pyramid Solitaire, try Klondike Solitaire or Spider Solitaire on OnlineGames.io. Both are great free online games!

Mental Health Benefits

Pyramid Solitaire offers relaxing fun with health benefits:

Mental Math Exercise

The game improves attention, mental math and memory through card matching.

Free Stress Reliever

The gentle rhythm helps tune out distractions and provides a calming break.

Longer Attention Span

Mindfulness Practice

One Last Word

name: Solitaire
description:
"Emma's afternoon hit a wall at exactly 3:17 PM. Her inbox chimed again, another urgent task from her manager. Minimized the spreadsheet and opened Solitaire on OnlineGames.io. The familiar green-felt background blinked to life. She took a slow sip of her iced latte from Dunkin'. The first shuffle felt like a deep breath. One by one, she moved cards to the foundation, each small stack a tiny win. Outside the window, a freight train rumbled past, and she almost missed it, lost in the shuffle of aces and kings. Her coworker, Max, dropped by with a question about quarterly targets. Emma smiled politely, trying to cover his screen, handed off the task, and then slipped back to her game. She tapped the screen faster now, racing to clear the deck before her fifteen-minute break ended. Her heart gave a little skip when the last card flipped into place. A perfect sweep. She leaned back, chest light as if she'd conquered something bigger than a simple deal. Back at her desk, she reopened that spreadsheet. The numbers looked friendlier now."

This story comes from one of our players on OnlineGames.io (we've tweaked names and a few details to keep her privacy, but the feeling is all theirs). As she says, "Sometimes, all it takes is a quiet moment and a deck of cards to turn the tide of a long workday." Just like Emma, you can step away from the buzz and dive into that calming world of solitaire cards. Head over to OnlineGames.io to deal with your first hand and see how a simple deck of cards can brighten any day.

Solitaire is a fun card game where you sort all 52 cards into four piles, one for each suit, from Ace up to King. Every time you clear a card, it feels like a small victory, just like Emma felt when she finished her break. If you're a newbie, it's okay. We explained everything you must know as simply as possible. Keep reading to learn the rules.

Controls

  • Click the stock pile (top left) to flip a new card.
  • Click or drag cards to move them between piles.
  • Double-click a card to send it to its foundation pile if it fits.

Rules

  • Make four foundations, one per suit (‚ô•‚ô¶‚ô£‚ô†), stacking Aces first, then 2, 3, and so on up to King.
  • On the tableau (the seven columns in the center), build downward in numbers and alternate colors (red on black, black on red).
  • Only a King (or a stack starting with a King) can go into an empty column slot.
  • Use the stock (face-down deck) to draw new cards when you can't move on the tableau.
  • Win by moving every card into the four foundation piles.

How to Play Solitaire

  • Look at the cards you can see on the table and in the flipped pile.
  • Move cards by clicking or dragging: you can only put a red card on a black card or a black on a red, and the numbers must go down by one (for example, put a red 5 on a black 6).
  • If you uncover an Ace, it'll be automatically moved to one of the four empty spots at the top.
  • When you flip a card from the face-down deck, look if it fits on the table or on the foundations. If it fits, click or drag it there.
  • If you clear a whole column, only a King (or a King-led stack) can go into that empty spot.
  • Keep doing this: flip cards, move cards, and sort them into the top piles.
  • You win when all cards end up in the four piles, from Ace up to King. If you get stuck, click on the undo button to try a new approach or click on the new game to start fresh.

Make a Wish

Have you ever heard that each round of Solitaire is a small test of fate? Before you start the game, think of one simple wish. Anything from "I hope I ace tomorrow's presentation" to "I wish for a sunny weekend." Then play as you normally would. If you clear the deck, legend says your wish is on its way to coming true. If you get stuck and can't finish, well... maybe it's a gentle nudge to try again later. Give it a go and see what the cards decide. You can even play Loves Me Loves Me Not with your solitaire outcome. It's up to your creativity to make the game even more exciting. And hey, please let us know Solitaire knew your fate in the comments below!

In case you enjoy this card-sorting game but need a fresh twist, try Klondike Solitaire on OnlineGames.io a free browser game that uses the same green felt backdrop, familiar rules, and one-deck shuffle to deliver endless relaxing fun.

What is Solitaire?

Solitaire is a one player card game. You start with a shuffled deck and move cards between piles following simple rules. Your goal is to build four piles from Ace up to King.

How do I play Solitaire on OnlineGames.io?

Click "New Game" to shuffle and lay out seven tableau piles. Drag a face-up card (or a group in sequence) onto another tableau pile if it alternates color and steps down in rank (for example, red 6 on black 7). Click Aces to move them to the top (or use auto collect), then add 2, 3, 4 up to King in each suit. Click the stock pile to reveal new cards one by one. Keep going until all cards are in the foundation piles or no more moves are possible.

How do I win at Solitaire?

You win by moving every card into the four foundation piles (one per suit), each stacked from Ace through King. A game ends when no cards remain on the tableau, stock, or waste.

Is Solitaire a game of skill or luck?

Solitaire combines both.It takes skills as deciding which moves to make, when to draw from the stock, and how to uncover hidden cards. But it also takes some luck as the initial shuffle affects how many cards are accessible early on. If one of your aces are stuck deep in the tableu, it's hard to win such a round. But you can improve solitaire skills to overcome tough shuffles.

How Can I win more often in Solitaire ?

First try to find the aces and twos. Then move cards that uncover face-down cards first. Try not to empty a pile if you don't have a King ready to place. Use the undo button and try different moves and backtrack if you get stuck.

What does Draw 1 and Draw 3 mean?

  • Draw 1: Clicking the stock deals one card to the waste at a time.
  • Draw 3: Clicking the stock deals three cards at once in a small stack. Only the top card is playable until you draw again.

Draw 1 is easier; Draw 3 is more challenging. The Solitaire version on this page uses Draw 1 approach, so you can clear cards easier.

Can I undo a move?

Yes. Click the Undo button at any time to reverse your last move. Click on redo move it again.

Is Solitaire free to play?

Yes, Solitaire on OnlineGames.io is 100 % free. And OnlineGames.io doesn't ask for sign-ups or downloads. Just load the page and click "New Game."

Do I need an internet connection?

You need an internet connection to pay the Solitaire Online game.

Can I play Solitaire on my phone or tablet?

Yes, our Solitaire game is responsive to both desktop and mobile. Use touch or mouse controls exactly the same way.

name: Geometry Arrow
description:
When you hit start, you don't just fire the arrow; you become itself. Race through a dark, hidden tunnel in Geometry Arrow. It's a super sleek, rhythm-driven platformer game like Geometry Dash online that puts your reflexes to the test. You guide a simple white arrow through a maze of sharp angles and spikes. You'll be rising and falling with a single tap. Across 12 difficult levels plus a hidden bonus stage, each set to its own upbeat music, you'll race against geometry itself. With clean, minimal graphics and instantly graspable controls, Geometry Arrow is a free browser game you can play online whenever you need a quick thrill on the go. Just a friendly reminder: take a breather when the rage becomes too intense. Trust me, you'll need it.

Controls

  • PC: Left mouse button or Spacebar: hold to ascend, release to descend
  • Mobile: Touch anywhere on the screen: press to lift, let go to drop

How to Play Geometry Arrow

  • From the moment your arrow appears at the left edge, it's all about timing. Press and hold (or tap and hold) to gently rise. Release when you need to fall.
  • Early levels ease you in, introducing one hazard at a time, like simple spikes, sawblades, and split ramps.
  • You'll learn that a quick tap clears a small spike while a longer hold soars over tall spikes.
  • Pay attention to the beat: each level's music isn't just background noise. A rising drumroll often hints at a tall barrier ahead, and a sudden bass drop might mean you need to let go and dive under a low overhang.
  • As you progress, obstacles compound. You'll navigate narrow corridors of spikes by tapping so fast your arrow darts in rapid zig-zags to slip past.
  • You'll see your progress in the bar at the top. Don't trust if you're near the end because of one little mistake, and you're back at the beginning. No checkpoints.

Developer

Geometry Arrow is distributed by Playgama. It's perfect for fans of quick-play Geometry Dash games.

Similar Games

If you love the minimalist challenge and rhythm-based jumps in Geometry Arrow, give Space Waves a try. In Space Waves, you guide a glowing orb through neon tunnels, timing your moves to electronic beats as obstacles surge and recede. It shares the same one-tap control scheme and pulse-pounding soundtrack but with more colorful visuals.

name: Golf Orbit
description:
Golf Orbit is an online golf game where one powerful shot can send your ball flying across the course and even into outer space! With just a single tap, you can launch the ball as far as possible, collect coins, and upgrade your golfer's abilities. The goal is to hit the ball farther with each shot. Just try not to land in a bunker, smack into a tree, take a surprise bath in the water... or, you know, get snatched by an eagle or abducted by a UFO. Weird things may happen in Golf Orbit. ‚õ≥

Controls

On Computers

  • Click or tap when the arrow is in the green zone for a perfect shot.
  • If the ball stops near the hole, hold the left click to aim and release to putt.

How to Play Golf Orbit

Your goal in Golf Orbit is to launch the ball as far as possible and, if you're lucky (or just really good), sink it into the hole.

When you start a round, a swing meter appears, moving back and forth like a metronome. There's a green zone in the middle, this is where you want to stop the meter for a perfect stroke. Tap at the right moment, and your golfer will send the ball soaring.

As the ball flies, it might bounce off trees, roll into bunkers, or take an unexpected dive into the water. If it stops close to the hole, you get a second shot. This time, the mechanics change: instead of a timing-based meter, you'll see an arrow indicating the ball's path. Tap and release at the right moment to sink the putt.

Score a Hole-In-One

Landing a hole-in-one is the ultimate goal in Golf Orbit, and if you pull it off, you'll be rewarded generously. If you manage to send the ball straight into the hole in a single shot, you'll score an eagle, multiplying your earnings by 10x. This means a massive coin boost, allowing you to upgrade your golfer faster and hit even farther in the next round.

However, not every shot is perfect. If your ball lands near the hole, you'll get a second chance. At this point, a more precise aiming mechanic kicks in‚Äîyou'll see a guiding arrow showing the ball's path. Tap to set your shot and release at the right moment to putt the ball into the hole. If you make it on the second attempt, you'll score a birdie, which triples your earnings.

Upgrade The Stroke

Coins earned from each round can be spent on three key upgrades:

  • Strength: Boosts your golfer's power for stronger swings.
  • Speed: Makes the ball travel through the air faster.
  • Bounce: Increases how far the ball rebounds off surfaces.

Upgrading these abilities is key to hitting longer shots and setting new records. The farther you hit the ball, the more coins you collect, allowing you to improve your stats even further.

The challenge increases as you go, with more difficult landscapes and obstacles appearing. Trees, sand traps, and water hazards can slow you down or stop your progress, so learning the best angles and power levels is important. Timing your swing perfectly is the key to mastering the game.

Ready to Become a Golf Champion?

If you love fun and simple golf games, Golf Orbit is the perfect game for you. Challenge yourself to hit new distance records, upgrade your golfer, and try to land the perfect hole-in-one.   • This is a rhythm-based game, and music makes the game more enjoyable. But if you think the music is distracting and making your job difficult at first, you may want to consider turning down the volume.
  • Practice with caution. Because becoming accustomed to this game will take some time. Your reflexes and focus will be put to the test in Geometry Dash. But believe me, it is worth it!
  • If you are having trouble skipping a level, don't bother trying to get the coin at that level. Let's look at the following matches!

Game Modes

  • Stereo Madness
  • Back on Track

When is Geometry Dash 2.2 coming out?

When did Geometry Dash come out?

name: Cube Worlds
description:
Remember those endless summer afternoons building castles and digging tunnels in Minecraft Classic? Cube Worlds brings back that exact feeling, but even more casual. It's the kind of block game you can fire up when you're between classes, stuck inside on a rainy day, or just in the mood to zone out and make something awesome. There's no survival pressure, no mobs creeping up behind you. It's just you, your blocks, and a wide open sandbox world that's waiting to be shaped.

Whether you're laying down pixel-perfect cities or trying to recreate your dream treehouse from fourth grade, this game's got you covered. The map is huge, terrain goes on forever, and you've got over 250 different blocks to work with: grass, stone, glass, lava, flowers, beds, torches, rails... You name it. And since nothing's trying to eat you, you've got all the time in the world to just chill and build a Minecraft castle.

Controls

  • Move: W / A / S / D
  • Jump: SPACE
  • Destroy: Left Click
  • Place: Right Click
  • Inventory: B
  • Set spawn: Enter
  • Respawn: R
  • Toggle fog: F
  • Speed boost: Left SHIFT
  • Half speed: Left CTRL
  • Fly: Z (Fly Up: Q / Fly Down: E)
  • NoClip: X
  • Third Person: F5
  • Zoom scroll: C
  • Hide GUI: F1
  • Smooth camera: F8
  • Drop block: G
  • Hotbar switch: Left ALT
  • Show axis lines: F7
  • Auto-rotate: F6
  • Hide FPS: F3

How to Play Cube Worlds

You start in a blocky world with nothing but your imagination. First things first. Hit B to open your inventory and check out all the block options. You can scroll through the list, pick your favorites, and assign them to your hotbar. Need some lava for drama? Want to build a glowing tower with torches? It's all there.

Once you've got your blocks ready, look around for a cool spot. Maybe a high hill, a flat field, or somewhere you can carve out a secret base. Right-click to place, left-click to destroy. That's it. You're building now.

Movement is simple, too. Walk around with the usual WASD setup, jump over obstacles with the spacebar, and if you ever get too far from home, hit Return to set a spawn point so you can get back with R later.

Want More Freedom? Take Flight.

One of the coolest things here is the flying mode. Press Z and you're airborne. You can float around your builds, scout out new areas, or just admire your creations from above. And if you want even more freedom, NoClip mode (X) lets you pass through blocks, perfect for checking out cave interiors or building inside mountains.

Flying too fast? Hold Ctrl to slow things down for precision. Need to cover ground quickly? Shift gives you a boost. It's like creative mode in Minecraft, but even smoother.

Game Features

  • 255+ block types from classic grass and stone to decorative pieces like ladders, glass, and beds
  • Full creative mode with flying, NoClip, camera controls, and more
  • Smooth controls and fast performance in-browser
  • Great for short breaks or long build sessions
  • Minecraft peaceful mode

Similar Minecraft Games for Builders and Dreamers

If Cube Worlds has you hooked on building blocks and shaping your own little world, there are a few other crafting games you should definitely check out. Paper Minecraft is a great pick if you want that Minecraft feel but much faster loading and smooth gameplay of 2D graphics. It's built with Scratch, but don't let that fool you, it has depth (not literally :D). You can explore, craft, and build just like in the original, but with its own style. It's especially fun if you enjoy checking out example worlds, explore them while gathering resources. Second, Minecraft Classic Online brings the nostalgia. It's the old-school version of Minecraft, exactly how it looked back in the early days. You can play it right in your browser, and it's perfect when you want to relive those early sandbox vibes without worrying about updates or fancy graphics. Another option is MiniBlox which is more about community and action. It has multiplayer rooms where you can hang out with friends or strangers, and the different game modes add variety. Whether you're into PvP, parkour, or just building weird stuff with others, MiniBlox gives you that Minecraft-inspired experience with a bit more social flavor.

Each of these building games brings something different to the table, but they all share that same core idea: giving you the freedom to build, dig, and imagine whatever you want. So start playing now!

name: Obby Tower Parkour Climb
description:
Obby Tower Parkour Climb is a parkour game with a cool Roblox vibe. You'll climb up colorful platforms and obstacle courses to reach the top. The game has three maps named Tunnel, Tower and Stairs. The best part of this obby game is you can play alone or race with a friend in split-screen mode. Plus there are two different modes on each map: normal and challenge. Learn about them below.

Editor's Review

I've played a lot of parkour games, and Obby Tower Parkour Climb is a nice one that mixes Roblox elements with climbing challenges. It's fun, especially when you play with a friend. It's not too intense, but it keeps you coming back to beat your last climb.

Controls

Single Player Mode:

  • Move: Use W, A, S, D or the Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Press SPACE
  • Sprint: Hold L-SHIFT
  • Look Around: Move your MOUSE to look, scroll to zoom

Two Player Mode:

  • Player 1:
    • Move: W, A, S, D
    • Jump: SPACE
    • Sprint: L-SHIFT
  • Player 2:
    • Move: Arrow Keys
    • Jump: L
    • Sprint: K

How to Play Obby Tower Parkour Climb

  • First, choose if you'd like to go solo or 2 player. In Two Player Mode, you and a friend compete side by side. Each player uses different controls. The first one to reach the top wins. It's a fun way to see who can master the tower faster.
  • Next, choose a map to start: Tunnel, Tower and Stairs maps are available with increasing difficulty. We suggest you start with Tunnel if you're new to Obby games.
  • Your goal is to climb to the top of the tower. Use the controls above to move, jump, and sprint.
  • Look around by moving your mouse to plan your next moves. There's no time limit, so focus on understanding the layout and mastering your moves.
  • You can check how far you climbed on the progress bar in the top left corner of your screen.
  • If you choose the challenge mode, this adds a timer to your climb. You need to reach the top as fast as possible. Practice the routes in Normal Mode to find the quickest way up. This mode is great for testing how fast you can complete the climb without any mistakes.

Developer

This game is made by CurcoraLabs.

Similar Games

description:

If you love traffic games, electrifying near misses, and tons of upgrades, then this one is for you. Roll out your ride, rev that engine, and show off your mad skills in Motor Tour. It's time to play this game online, take on races, and leave ordinary driving sims in the dust. Hit the road now, and get ready for the ride of your life!

Other Bike Games

It really stands out with endless racing modes, cool bikes, premium 3d graphics and tight controls. Keep an eye on OnlineGames.io for more exciting titles to test your driving and reflexes!

Controls

  • W: Move Forward

  • D: Turn Right
  • S: Brake
  • Left Shift: Nitro Boost
  • ESC: Go Back/Pause

How to Play Motor Tour

You can start by selecting your favorite game mode: Career, Special Event, Endless, or Race. For beginners, it's a good idea to practice in endless mode first. You'll cruise down a busy highway until you crash, so it's perfect to get a feel for the bike's handling.

Or you can try career mode where you'll tackle different missions under time pressure. It starts with relatively easy missions and the difficulty ramps up slowly. You can prove you can handle tight turns and avoid reckless drivers while collecting enough cash to unlock more upgrades. In Race mode, challenge tough AI opponents in an intense head-to-head showdown, collect nitrous on the road to gain an edge over your rival. Want something different? Special Event mode offers fun tasks and big loot rewards.

Game Features

  • 40 Motorbikes: With 40 different bikes in the garage, you won't run out of choices. Each one has its own style, and you can show your personality by customizing your license plate. Represent your country with its flag, and write a cool message on the plate.
  • Deep Upgrades: Boost power, turbo, brakes, acceleration, handling, and nitro. Each upgrade helps you handle your bike better and improve overall performance. The best way to dominate the road is to keep enhancing those stats.
  • Multiple Game Modes: Pick from four main modes: Career, Special Event, Endless, or Race. Each one offers a new challenge, whether you love timed missions, intense races, or endless cruising.
  • Premium 3D Graphics: The game sports impressive visuals that make every ride feel realistic. From the shine on your motorbike to the detailed cityscape, you'll be drawn into the action.
  • Online Rewards: Motor Tour lets you watch ads to earn quick cash, gold, or blueprints. It might be worth it if you're in a hurry to get that new upgrade or unlock a new bike!

Developer

Motor Tour is developed by Wolves Interactive. They blended realistic bike physics, gorgeous 3D visuals offering a endless replay value.

name: Skribblio
description:
Scribble, scribble, scribble!‚úç‚úç‚úçSkribblio is a great online game for word game lovers with extensive drawing skills. Draw the given word, and let the other participants guess the word correctly as fast as possible.

When you are done with the scribbling, it's your turn to guess. Be as quick as possible in both drawing and guessing; then, you will gain more points.

How to Play Skribblio?

  • At first, pick a username and enter a room.
  • You will see a number of players in the room.
  • When it's your turn, you will draw the given word. If not, try to guess the word.
  • Don't forget to chat with others while playing. Have a great time!
  • Learn about how to draw and make a guess below.

Draw The Given Word

  • You will see several word options if it's your turn to scribble.
  • Choose a word that you can draw well.
  • You have 80 seconds to draw the word.
  • You will see the toolbox at the bottom.
  • Choose the color and size of the pen.
  • Start drawing your word and let them guess as soon as possible.
  • Using different colors beautifies your drawings and increases your chances.
  • If you misdraw something, you can undo or clear the board.
  • To erase a part of the drawing, use the swap.
  • Use the hotkeys to draw faster.

Hotkeys

  • U: Undo the last action
  • B: Choose the brush
  • F: Fill / Color the area
  • C: Clear the board
  • S: Swap between brush and eraser

Guess the Word Before Others

  • While the other players draw, you must guess the word in the right-hand chat section.
  • You can guess as many times as you want. No limit on that.
  • The number of letters is at the top of your screen. Consider that while guessing the word.
  • The faster you find the word, the more points you get. If you find the word, make your guess before others and get the points!
  • Use like and dislike buttons to show your satisfaction with a player's drawing.

Create A Private Room in Skribblio

  • If you'd like, you can make Skribble.io a private experience.
  • Create your own room and send the invitation link to your friend(s).
  • Set the language, draw time, number of players and rounds.
  • You can even set a bunch of custom words and play only with them. Some inside jokes would perfectly fit here, huh?
  • Select the word mode: Normal, Hidden and Combination
  • In hidden word mode, you will only see question marks instead of hints while guessing.
  • In combination mode, you must draw or guess 2 words at once. Challenge yourself in combination mode if you think you are a pro scribbler.

How many players are there in Skribblio?

A minimum of 2 and a maximum of 20 players can participate in a Skribblio room. You may notice some players leave or enter while the game continues.

Can you use a tablet pen with Skribblio?

Yes, you can use a tablet pen with Skribblio. In order to do that, connect your drawing tablet to your computer. Arrange your settings so that you can move your cursor by dragging your tablet pen. Then, you are ready to show off your drawing skills in Skribblio.

How do I change the line size and colors in Skribblio?

The toolbox is at the bottom of the screen. Its functions include showing your pen's color and size, as well as an eraser and an undo button for when you misdraw.

Which languages are available in Skribblio?

Skribblio is most commonly played in English. However, you can play Skribblio in 28 languages, including German, French, Italian, and Japanese. Choose your language before entering a room. If you select a less-spoken language, you may need to wait for other players to join the game for a while. If you want to play it immediately, invite your friends to play together.

Can you spectate in Skribblio?

Unfortunately, you can't. There is no spectator mode in Skribblio yet. If you are too shy to participate or draw in a Skribblio room, don't worry. Your turn will only take 80 seconds. It will get much easier and more fun when you play along. Give yourself a couple of rounds to get used to it.

How do I kick someone out in Skribblio?

At Skribblio, there is a democratic atmosphere. If you did not like a player's behavior in the game, you may vote to kick them by clicking on the pax. If the majority votes for kicking that player, he is out of the room.

If you have created the room, you can kick anyone without voting.

Which game is Skribblio inspired by?

Skribblio is inspired by the famous board game Pictionary. Some consider Skribblio as an online version of Pictionary.

Developer

Skribblio was created by ticedev.

Similar Games

If you like drawing games, test your hand at Draw the Bridge. Or else, continue the fun by playing our fantastic Drawing Games collection. Follow the links to play for free on your browser.

name: Vex X3M 2
description:
Vex X3M 2 is where the slick parkour madness of the original Vex meets the extreme bike stunts of Moto X3M. If you thought dodging spikes and leaping over saws was intense on foot, wait until you try it on two wheels! This parkour racing game takes the familiar Vex vibe, tight controls, and tricky traps such as spikes, explosives, guns and rolling platforms and throws in a turbocharged motorcycle. With new mechanics like kite gliding and teleportation portals, each level becomes a wild ride filled with action.

You'll race through obstacle-packed tracks, soar across massive gaps, and flip your way through moving traps. Be warned! This game requires lots of gaming skills. But it's also rewarding if you dare to speed. So don't be afraid to take risks! Just be ready for the unexpected because platforms fall, walls move, and one wrong move could send you back to the last checkpoint flag.

Controls

  • Accelerate: W or Up Arrow
  • Tilt Left/Right: A / D or Left and right arrow keys
  • Brake/Reverse: S or Down Arrow

How to Play Vex X3M 2

  • Start by choosing a level track from the map. There are 30 tracks with increasing difficulty.
  • Use your bike to ride through each level as fast as you can.
  • Watch out for deadly traps like spikes, saws, swinging axes, and crumbling platforms.
  • Use new tools like kite gliders to fly over gaps and teleporters (green zones) to zap across dangerous areas.
  • Complete the level to earn up to 3 stars based on your time.
  • Toggle the hard mode on the top right of the level select menu to replay levels with an extra challenge and more stars.
  • Unlock custom bike skins with the stars you collect!

Tips & Tricks for Parkour Games

In parkour games like Vex X3M 2, it's usually a bad idea to speed through a level on your first try. Trust me, you probably won't be able to make it to the end at the first trial in this kind of skill games. So, take a moment to study the traps and obstacles; you'll save yourself a lot of restarts. If the game gives you special movement tools like gliders or teleporters like this one, spend some time getting used to how they work. They can really help, but they're not always easy to control at first.

Pay attention to the rhythm of moving traps just like you did in Geometry Dash. Most of them follow predictable patterns because the obstacles and timing are usually fine-tuned by game designers. So once you get the timing down, dodging becomes much easier. And if you crash? Don't sweat it. Quickly restart from your last checkpoint and try again. The faster you finish, the better your score or star rating will be.

Also, don't ignore unlockable items like skins. They might seem cosmetic, but in a lot of these games, unlocking new gear is a sign that you've really mastered the course. It's a fun way to show off your progress.

Developer

Azerion Casual Games created Vex X3M 2, bringing together the best of both worlds in a fan-favorite hybrid. It's perfect for players who love action platformers and stunt challenges.

More Online Stunt Games to Try

Love flipping over danger and racing against the clock? Check these out next: Moto X3M Online is a classic bike stunt action game with beachy explosions and sharp curves. Or try Vex 7, the latest parkour challenge through lasers, traps, and sneaky surprises. All games are online, free to play, and smooth in your browser! So dive in!

How to play GTA Simulator?

description:

What is Stickman Parkour about?

Imagine Stickman, a tiny stick figure who decides one day to go on this epic adventure. He's on a mission to find these super special golden keys. These keys aren't just for opening doors; they unlock these ancient, mysterious gates that might be hiding treasures as cool as a room full of candy! Stickman doesn't have to worry about school or chores, so he's all in for this adventure.

His journey is full of crazy challenges like dodging sharp spikes, swinging on ropes like a monkey, and even swimming like he's in a stick figure Olympics. Each key he finds opens a new gate, leading to more challenges. The big dream? To find the very last gate with the final golden key in his pocket!

Controls

For Computers:

  • Move: Left/Right Arrows or A/D
  • Jump: Up Arrow/W
  • Slide/Dive: Down Arrow/S

For Mobiles:

  • Use on-screen buttons to control Stickman

How to Play Stickman Parkour

  • Use your keyboard or the buttons on the screen to make Stickman jump over dangers, swing on ropes, and swim through water. It's like playing a superhero in a stick-figure world!
  • Your job is to help Stickman grab these golden keys. They're like the ultimate treasure map pieces!
  • Get Stickman to the end of each level, which is marked by a funny squiggle.

Developer

Stickman Parkour game was created by FreezeNova Games Studio.

Explore More Adventures

If you're all about Stickman's high-flying escapades, you'll definitely want to try Fancy Pants. In this side-scrolling game, you control a stick figure with an epic hairdo and even fancier pants, running through worlds that are as wild as Stickman's obstacle course but with its own unique twist of humor and style. It's like if Stickman decided to get a wardrobe upgrade and a new set of challenges.

name: Escape Car
description:
Do you remember the very first Grand Theft Auto? That old-school, top-down chaos. Think of that and give it a fresh coat of chunky 3D graphics. Next, drop that straight in your browser. Yes, it's Escape Car, a free online GTA game where you bolt through a mini-city, dodge police cars, tanks, helicopters and scoop up stacks of cash. Every tight drift, every split-second fake-out, and every totaled police cruiser bumps your score higher. Hang on long enough, and you'll leave with pockets full of upgrade money and a grin wider than the avenue.

Controls

  • A or Left Arrow to steer left
  • D or Right Arrow to steer right.

How to Play Escape Car

  • The moment you touch A or D, the police chase begins.
  • Drive as long as you possibly can without letting the cops box you in. Grab the cash piles on the road for extra money.
  • The BUSTED bar at the top fills with every bump; solid red means game over.
  • The longer you survive, the faster the score counter on the top left ticks.
  • Watch the stars next to your score; each new star means tougher cops and bigger points. First more cars show up, then heavy trucks, and later even tanks and helicopters.
  • When you finally bite the curb, your score instantly converts to money for upgrades. Unlock a new faster car from the garage and repeat. Hit restart and see if that next run tops your record.

Unlock Cool Cars

Money burning a hole in your pocket? Slide over to the Garage and spend it on a random mystery car. You might pull:

  • a tuner that slides around corners like butter,
  • a muscle car that turns cruisers into scrap, or
  • a sports coupe perfect for weaving through traffic.

Collect them all and build the dream garage you brag about in the comments. No two runs feel the same once you start swapping rides.

Developer

Escape Car comes from FreezeNova Games, the studio behind one of the most popular games on OnlineGames.io: Police Chase Drifter. Think of Escape Car as its bigger, shinier 3D cousin, with the same tense pursuits, way more polish. Ready to floor it? Click Play and prove you can outrun the law and maybe unlock that perfect supercar while you're at it.

name: Smash Karts
description:
Imagine a 3D multiplayer go-kart bonanza where the track isn't just for racing, but for full-on vehicular mayhem! Welcome to Smash Karts, where elegance meets anarchy, and every turn could lead to either a victory parade or a spectacular kart-smashing spectacle.

Smash Karts is a online driving battle game, as you hit the start button, you're zooming through a kaleidoscope of maps, from candyland nightmares to neon-lit cityscapes. But it's not just about who crosses the finish line first; it's about who remains un-smashed! You'll encounter a barrage of weaponry from your fellow kart jockeys‚Äîguns, missiles, mines, and yes, even nukes. Your mission? Stay alive, smash others, and rack up those sweet, sweet XP points. Just keep an eye out for those gift boxes; they're your lifeline for arming up with random weapons.

Controls

  • Up Arrow or W: Gas
  • Down Arrow or S: Brake
  • Left Arrow or A: Steer Left
  • Right Arrow or D: Steer Right
  • Space: Fire

How to Play Smash Karts

  • Head over to OnlineGames.io, find Smash Karts, and dive in by clicking that big, shiny "Play" button.
  • Use your arrow keys or WASD to steer, but remember, in this game, driving straight might be the quickest way to your kart's funeral.
  • Collect those question-marked boxes for a surprise weapon. You only carry one at a time, so choose your moments wisely. Got a mine? Drop it where the traffic's thickest. Gun or nuke? Aim true and obliterate the competition.
  • Each box you drive through is like a Christmas present from a slightly unhinged Santa. Mines, nukes, guns‚Äîoh my! Use them to climb that leaderboard.
  • If you're the last kart standing, you win! It's like musical chairs, but with more explosions.
  • Earn coins and gems to deck out your kart with the craziest skins and characters. Fancy a clown driving a disco ball kart? Here's your chance.

Game Modes Explained

There are three game modes you can choose in custom multiplayer rooms. Apart from modes you can enable teams, set round duration between 3 to 20 mins, customize weapons and more.

  • Free For All (FFA): It's every kart for themselves! Collect weapons from those mysterious boxes and use them to smash opponents. The player with the most kills at the end of the round wins. It's pure, unadulterated kart chaos.
  • Gem Collector: Scattered around the arena are gems. Your mission is to collect more gems than your rivals before time runs out. Think of it like a treasure hunt, but with a lot more explosions.
  • Hat Holder: One hat to rule them all! Find and hold onto the hat for as long as you can while everyone else tries to take it from you. You can't use weapons while carrying the hat, so it's all about evasion and cunning.

The Arena of Anarchy: Smash Karts io Game Maps

Dive into an colorful and chaotic maps, each with its own flair for destruction. These tracks are not just for racing; they're battlefields where every corner hides the potential for either glory or a hilarious wipeout.

  • Graveyard

name: Five Nights at Poppy
description:
Ever stayed late at school or walked through a dark hallway alone and felt like something was watching you? Did you just hear the footsteps? Is it the wind or someone whistling? Now imagine that same creep, but at an abandoned mental hospital where animatronic Poppy from FNAF stays in. That's exactly where Five Nights at Poppy throws you.

This creepy online horror game puts you in the shoes of a night shift security guard just as in first three FNAF games. But you're not watching out the Freddy's Pizzeria this time. Instead, you're patrolling the mental hospital Poppy is kept. She is angrier than ever. She's got wide glowing eyes, an eerie smile, and definitely she's not here to play.

With the lights flickering and cameras going out, your job is to survive five long nights from 12:00 AM to 6:00 AM. It starts out quiet. Maybe even boring. But by the time the static hits your screens and Poppy's shadow shows up at your door, it's a whole different game. Do whatever you can before you get jumpscared!

Content Warning

Five Nights at Poppy contains intense horror themes, including sudden jump scares, flashing lights, unsettling imagery, and disturbing audio effects. This game is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for younger players or individuals sensitive to frightening content. Viewer discretion is advised. Parental guidance is recommended for children.

Controls

  • Left Click: Interact with lights, doors, and cameras
  • Click and Hold: Repair damaged camera feeds

How to Play Five Nights at Poppy

You begin each night sitting in a small security office with monitors all around. Each screen shows different parts of the hospital‚Äîlike patient rooms, hallways, and a morgue. Your main jobis to watch out for Poppy.

Poppy moves slowly at first and switches back and forth between rooms. But as the nights go by, she becomes faster, sneakier, and more aggressive. She's not just creepy but also smart. If your cameras stay broken too long or you waste power-flipping switches, she'll strike. Here's what to keep track of:

  • Cameras: If one goes fuzzy or shows static, press and hold for a while to repair it.
  • Power: You have limited energy. Leaving doors closed or lights on drains it fast.
  • Corridors: Watch the left and right doors near your office. If you see glowing eyes, close the door fast!

Each night gets harder. You'll need to react quicker as the game goes on. It's a game of multitasking. One mistake, and Poppy's in your face. And trust us, the jumpscares are no joke.

Developer

Five Nights at Poppy was created by FreezeNova, known for making free browser games. That means no downloads no installs, just open and play on OnlineGames.io whenever you want.

Discover More Free Scary Games Online

If you're into online horror games with a serious scare factor, there are plenty more waiting for you. From haunted houses to twisted animatronic stories, you can explore titles where every second counts and one wrong click can end your night. Whether you're a fan of classic FNAF-style gameplay or want something more psychological, you'll find it here on OnlineGames.io. Get ready for more eerie soundtracks, flickering screens, and creepy enemies. And yes, headphones make it all 10x scarier.

It's like Santa's gone rogue in the crime world!

Whether you're following orders from your Mafia Boss or just exploring the vast open world, Stickman GTA City lets you play it your way. Have fun!

‚ö† Mature Content Warning
Stickman GTA City is recommended for mature players due to frequent violence, crime-focused missions, and intense action sequences. These elements may be unsuitable for younger audiences. If you prefer a more casual or family-friendly experience, check out other free games on our site. Player discretion is advised.

How to Play Stickman GTA City

  • Start by picking a place to spawn on the GTA city map.
  • You'll begin with your first mission of evading the police and driving to the mafia escape house.
  • After completing the first mission, you're free to follow mafia missions or explore the city at your own pace. You can access main and side missions using Stickman's phone. Completing missions will bring lots of cash.
  • Use your Stickman's skills to steal vehicles, take down enemies, and evade the cops. Collect money and weapons scattered across the city.

name: Survival Race
description:
It's a race of survival. The one who stays in the arena wins the game. Steer on the platform at full speed, crash other cars, and drop them out. Survival Race is a free online car game offering a thrilling experience. Make stunts or roll over holes and collect coins in this battle royale racing game!

Controls

Desktops and Laptops
