  • Steer Right: D/Right Arrow
  • Jump: W/Up arrow/Spacebar/LMB
  • Fly: Double press W/Up arrow/Space

How to Play Survival Race?

  • The race starts immediately after pressing the play button. Steer your car over the arena.
  • The aim is to kick out all other cars to be the winner.
  • Stay away from corners to be on the safe side.
  • When another player drives on the arena, blocks will go down after it, leaving holes in the platform.
  • When a hole emerges in front of you, jump by pressing W.
  • You can also fly for a short period by pressing W twice.
  • Collect coins and power-ups on your way. Coins will bring you better cars, while powerups will make your car more resilient to attacks.
  • There are dozens of sports cars to unlock in the garage. If you'd like to change the color of your car, simply go to the garage in the main menu and select the color to stand out from the crowd in the arena.

Game Modes

  • Practice: Free race without opponents
  • Battle: Survive in the arena
  • Parkour: Collect stars
  • Autoball: Soccer played bar cars. Score goals to win.

Tips and Tricks for Survival Race

  • Roads are slippery. Don't oversteer; otherwise, your car will drift in a crazy way, resulting in a fall out of the arena.
  • Go to options to set your steering and drift levels.
  • Sharp steering and minimum drifting will provide you with more precision.

You May Also Like

If you'd like to play more games like Survival Race, our recommendation is Crazy Car Arena. name: Sprunki
description:
Sprunki is a fun and creative music game where you can become a DJ. Dress up characters from a quirky band called the Sprunki by dragging and dropping cool clothes and accessories onto them. Each costume or accessory you choose adds a different musical sound, such as bass, melody, or drums. Enter the world of colorful Sprunkis, like Mr. Tree, Mr Sun, Lime and Garnold. If you're feeling extra whimsical, put the black hat on any member. And things will take a spooky turn. The theme gets darker, and visuals and sounds get scarier. Each hat and each accessory you put on makes the Sprunkis feel like they ran away from a horror movie.

Controls

  • Computers: Use your mouse to drag and drop accessories
  • Mobiles: Drag and drop accessories by tapping

How to Play Sprunki

  • Begin by picking a fun character from the lineup, each with its own special sound.
  • You'll see different outfits or accessories at the bottom.
  • Dress each of the Sprunks to give them unique sound elements.
  • You'll encounter quirky items like devil horns, tree and sun costumes, bunny ears and even satellite dishes along the way. You cannot use an item on multiple Sprunks. If you'd like to reset the band, click on the replay button on the top right.
  • Mix and match different music loops and sounds to create beautiful melodies or experimental tracks.
  • If you want to concentrate on one character's sound, just hover over them and click the headphone icon to mute the others.
  • Similarly, you can mute one's sound by hovering over them and clicking the mute icon.
  • Don't be afraid to experiment with different outfits to discover hidden musical surprises!

What Is Sprunki Incredibox?

Incredibox is a unique experimental music app that lets you conduct a group of beatboxers. Sprunki Incredibox originated as a fun, fan-made mode created by a 15-year-old Incredibox user named NyankoBfLol. It skyrocketed and quickly gained popularity, attracting an audience twice the size of the original Incredibox. What makes Sprunki truly unique is its shift from a joyful music game to a more eerie experience. The bright colors slowly change to darker shades, and your characters gain spooky looks. This creepy twist of this mode captured the imagination of users, leading to its own standalone game.

Even more surprisingly, Sprunki characters have emerged as new horror mascots, joining the ranks of figures like the Rainbow Friends, Freddy Fazbear, Granny, and Poppy. Fans all around the world have contributed to the Sprunki hype in a way. Today, you can find Sprunks not only in online music-making games but also across various genres, such as horror games, platformers, trivia games, and more. For example, in Obby: Find Sprunki game, you can go for a Sprunki hunt and find hidden characters on an obstacle course. There are even fan fiction stories that explore themes around Sprunkis being orphans or having disabilities, adding depth to their intriguing lore.

Developer

The original Incredibox mode was created by NyankoBfLol. This version of Sprunki game was created by Sprunki Games.

name: Granny
description:
Granny is a horror-puzzle game where your survival skills, quick thinking, and stealth will be working non-stop. This scary game takes place in a Granny's eerie house, where you wake up in a bloody bed and realize you're trapped. Your room's door is locked from the outside, and your ultimate goal is to escape from this hell. But it's not that simple. Granny has a surprisingly sharp hearing for her age. She is always on the hunt and has a knack for finding you. This game is a mix of fear, strategy, and problem-solving that will keep your heart racing and your mind working overtime. So, if you're ready for jumpscare moments, wear your headphones, hit the play button and see if you can escape from Granny's House!

‚ö† Mature Content Warning
This horror game features intense fear-based elements, graphic imagery, and disturbing themes. It is intended for mature audiences and may not be suitable for all players. If you're sensitive to frightening content, please explore our other free games. Player discretion is advised.

Controls

For Computers:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look around
  • E: Interact
  • C: Sit/Stand
  • R: Hide
  • Space: Throw objects
  • F: Escape traps

For Mobiles:

  • Joystick (Left): Move
  • Touchpad (Right): Look around
  • Hand Icon: Interact
  • Chair Icon: Sit/Stand
  • Bed Arrow Icon: Hide
  • Item Drop Icon: Throw objects

How to Play Granny

  • If you're new to the game or just want to explore without the heart-pounding chase, try Practice mode. Here, Granny is away, giving you a chance to plan your escape.
  • For those seeking a challenge, there are five difficulty levels to choose from, ranging from easy to extreme. Pick the level and hit start.
  • You have five attempts to succeed. Granny hears every sound, so tread carefully and avoid noisy mistakes like knocking over objects or stepping on creaky floors.
  • The house is filled with mysterious items like keys, closets, books, and tools. Press E to interact with them.
  • Each item has a purpose, but you'll need to figure out how to use them to unlock doors or access hidden areas. Explore the house, find clues, and solve puzzles.
  • Remember that there is no single way of escaping. In order to make a great getaway, you can try one of the multiple escape routes available. You can aim to unlock the front door or try fixing up the old car in the garage... It's up to you.

Tips for a Smooth Getaway

  • Avoid making noise at all costs‚ÄîGranny reacts to even the faintest sounds.
  • Beds, closets, and chests make great hiding spots if Granny is nearby.
  • Be mindful of where you drop items, as they can create noise and reveal your location.
  • Watch your step! Granny's traps can slow you down or leave you vulnerable.
  • Use weapons sparingly‚Äîthey can hinder Granny, but only for a brief time.
  • You can gain five additional attempts to escape by watching ads.

More Jumpscare Games

If eerie sounds, dim lighting, suspenseful gameplay and lots of JUMPSCARES are what you look for in a game, you might love other horror games online. Each title will test your wits and nerves in a different terrifying scenario. Try them all, and let us know which is your favorite in the comment section.

description:

Tips and Tricks

  • Try out different balls from the Ball Shop. Each type has its unique speed and trajectory, which can help you find the best fit for your playstyle.

How to play Stickman Destruction?

  • Like unlocking new levels, you can unlock different vehicles, too. There are 11 vehicles. You can choose one of them and increase the number of broken bones.
  • You have two aid tools, Magnet and Vane Bamboo, which you can get from the left side of the screen. You can get them with your points or by watching videos.
  • Additionally, various tools named Props are at your disposal to deal the most damage.

Vehicles

name: Rooftop Duel
description:
Can you handle a rooftop shoot-out with gravity, ragdoll limbs, and a toybox of overpowered weapons? The recoil is wild here. Rooftop Duel piles all the goofy physics of classic ragdoll games. You'll try to knock off your opponent on a city rooftop. Press play and you hop straight into a duel; There are no downloads, no sign-ups; just jump, aim, and laugh as you and your opponent rocket each other off narrow city rooftops.

Grab a friend or fly solo, hit Play, and see how long you can stay on the roof. Just don't blame the game when you're laughing too hard to aim straight!

Let's get to the controls and game modes together:

Controls

Player 1

  • W / Right Mouse : Jump
  • Hold E / Left Mouse : Aim
  • Release E / Release Left-Mouse : Shoot

Player 2

  • I : Jump
  • Hold O : Aim
  • Release O : Shoot

How to Play Rooftop Duel

Once the round loads, both ragdoll fighters try to balance on a rooftop. Tap jump, hold to aim, then let go to shoot. Every shot packs recoil, so a blast can rescue you from the edge or fling you into mid-air.

Floaty jumps give you a moment to dodge an incoming bullet, or if you mistime things, you'll sail straight into the abyss. If you stay up while your opponent falls, you win the round, collect coins, and head back to the shop for an even sillier weapon before the next rooftop showdown.

Game Modes

Rooftop Duel has three main game modes that offer different ways to play depending on whether you're playing alone or with a friend.

  • 2 Player Mode: local multiplayer mode where two players share the same keyboard. Each player uses their own set of keys to jump and shoot. First player uses W and E while the second uses I and O keys. The round continues until one player knocks the other off the rooftop. You'll play 5 rounds to complete a match. This mode is only available on devices with a keyboard, so it is best played on a laptop or desktop. If you're using a mobile, try other modes instead.
  • Missions Mode: a series of short levels, each with a specific objective. It's a good place to start if you want to get used to the controls, learn how different weapons behave, and see new rooftops each round.
  • Survivor Mode: the goal is to stay alive for as long as possible. You'll face a continuous wave of enemies. The difficulty increases the longer you last. This mode requires a bit quicker reactions and good control compared to other modes. It's recommended to unlock more powerful weapons before playing, as basic gear can make it difficult to survive for long.

Developer

Rooftop Duel is cooked up by FreezeNova, the studio behind a stack of popular unblocked ragdoll games like Soccer Random Pro.

name: Pacman 30th Anniversary
description:
Who's not afraid of ghosts? Pac-Man is!

In the neon glow of 1980s arcades, a legendary yellow hero was born - shaped like a pizza missing a slice! While ghosts may scare him at first, power pellets turn the tables in this timeless chase. Creator Toru Iwatani crafted Pac-Man's relationship with the ghosts to mirror the classic Tom & Jerry dynamic.

Celebrating 30 years of wakka-wakka magic, Google immortalized Pac-Man as an interactive Doodle - complete with the Google logo cleverly hidden in the maze! This special edition features enhanced graphics and browser accessibility, bringing retro arcade thrills to modern players.

Ready to master the maze? Our ultimate guide unlocks everything: gameplay secrets, fascinating trivia, world records, and answers to burning questions about both the classic and Google Doodle versions of this iconic game.

  • ‚Ä¢ Pacman 30th Anniversary

  • ‚Ä¢ Controls
  • ‚Ä¢ 2-Player Mode
  • ‚Ä¢ Pac-Man's Legacy
  • ‚Ä¢ FAQ

Pacman 30th Anniversary

How to Play Pac-Man

  • Guide the yellow hero through mazes to collect all dots while avoiding colorful ghosts
  • Power pellets turn ghosts blue - chase and eat them for bonus points!
  • Collect fruits for extra points as difficulty increases each level
  • Master ghost patterns to achieve high scores and break records

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Move Pac-Man
  • WASD: Control Ms. Pac-Man (2-player mode)
  • Click: Insert Coin

2-Player Mode

Pac-Man's Cultural Impact

  • Inspired hit song "Pac-Man Fever" and countless merchandise
  • Coined the "Pac-Man defense" business strategy term
  • Inducted into The Strong Museum's Hall of Fame (2015)

Did You Know?

Game Over?

name: Papa's Sushiria
description:
Ever accidentally broke something... and somehow ended up running a whole restaurant because of it? That's exactly what happens in Papa's Sushiria. One minute you're visiting the newest sushi place in town, and the next. BAM! You're rolling rice, slicing tuna, and shaking up bubble teas like a pro. Now it's on you to keep the sushi bar running smoothly. Take customer orders, cook everything just right, and don't forget the boba drinks. Whether you're into California rolls or loaded spicy combos, you'll get to build them all. It's fast, it's fun, and yeah, it gets a little chaotic, just like real food service.

Controls

  • Use your mouse to navigate menus, select ingredients, and complete all tasks.
  • Click, drag, and hold to prepare food items step-by-step.

How to Play Papa's Sushiria

Running Papa's Sushiria might sound overwhelming at first, but once you get the hang of it, it's super satisfying. Everything starts when a customer walks in and places their order. You'll need to pay close attention to what they want‚Äîevery little detail counts, from the type of rice to the fillings, sauces, and even their bubble tea preferences. Once you've got the order down, it's time to cook the rice. This part is all about timing. You scoop the right amount, start the cooker, and wait for it to finish. Don't leave it too long or it'll burn. While it cooks, you can get things ready for the next steps. Next comes the fun part: building the sushi roll. Lay out the seaweed, spread the rice, stack the fillings in the right order, then roll it up just right. It might take a couple tries to get perfect, but it feels great when you nail it. After rolling, you'll slice the sushi evenly and add any toppings or sauces the customer asked for. Presentation really matters here. Then it's off to the drink station. Most customers want a bubble tea to go with their food, so you'll need to pick the correct tea, the flavor, and how much ice and boba to add. It's a mini-game on its own and a fun way to break things up. Once everything's ready, hand the order over and see how you did. The customer will rate you based on accuracy, timing, and how neat everything looks. High scores mean bigger tips, which you can use for upgrades, new furniture, or snazzy uniforms. As you level up, more ingredients and customers unlock, making each day a little more exciting‚Äîand a little more hectic!

Developer

Papa's Sushiria was created by Flipline Studios, known for their entire lineup of fun restaurant and time management games.

More Online Papa's Games to Play Next

Love the satisfying rhythm of cooking and serving? You'll probably enjoy other Papa's titles like Papa's Burgeria and Papa's Pancakeria. All of these are browser-based, fun, and free to play online on OnlineGames.io!

name: Suroi
description:
In a post-apocalyptic 2D world, you awaken with nothing in your pockets but the will to survive in your heart. Wander around the arena for anything that might help you survive in a place swarming with enemies. Found a bottle of cola? Toss it in your backpack. Did you see a vest and helmet? Gear up for protection. Come across an MP40 or a box of grenades? Consider yourself lucky; you're making progress!

Suroi io is an online multiplayer survival game inspired by Surviv.io. Your mission: gather loot, chests, weapons, medkits, and whatever else you can find to survive in this hostile environment. Explore, avoid enemies, and that toxic orange gas. Collect your essentials and eliminate opponents. Soon, they'll be the ones fleeing from you. Dominate the field and carve your name on the leaderboard.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Attack: Left-Click
  • Change Weapons: 1,2,3 or Mouse Scroll
  • Pickup/Interact: F
  • Reload: R
  • Use Healing Item: Left-Click on the item or 7-0
  • Cancel Action: X
  • Toggle Fullscreen Map: G or M
  • Toggle Minimap: N
  • Use Emote Wheel: Hold Right-Click, drag, and release
  • Team Ping: Hold Right-Click and C, drag, and release
  • Request Item: Hold C and click on the item
  • Drop Item: Right-click on the item
  • Equip Last Item: Q
  • Swap Gun Slots: T
  • Equip Other Gun: Space
  • Change Scope Zoom: Left-Click on Scope

How to Play

  • Suroi is a battle royale io game where strategic thinking is key to survival.
  • First, collect armor, weapons, medikits, and ammo.
  • To find them, enter abandoned houses, break into closets, or open boxes by left-clicking‚Äîpress F to equip your findings.
  • Once you're armed enough, defend your team and take down opponents. Dodge enemy attacks and send them to spectator mode to watch how you've got there!

Healing Items

In duo mode, you can revive your teammate, and they can revive you. In solo mode, you're on your own, so stock up on healing items. Save especially the Medikits for an emergency when you need it. Here's what you need to know to stay in the fight:

  • Gauze: Restores 15 health
  • Medikit: Restores 100 health
  • Cola: Restores 25 adrenaline
  • Tablets: Restore 50 adrenaline

Beware the Orange Gas

  • Enemies aren't your only threat. In this post-apocalyptic world, a toxic orange gas spreads across the map, killing anyone who breathes it in. Keep an eye on the map in the top-left corner of your screen. When you see the orange shadow, run.
  • As the game progresses, the gas will cover more of the map, shrinking the safe zone.
  • Now you're ready to survive in Suroi.io! May your health bar stay full, and good luck out there!

Developer

Hasanger Games created Suroi.io

Similar Games

If you've enjoyed browser-based battle royales like Surviv.io and ZombsRoyale.io, you'll feel right at home here. Keep the adventure alive by playing other battle royale games on OnlineGames.io! What about forming a squad with pets in Taming io next?

name: Carnage Battle Arena
description:
Buckle up and play Carnage Battle Arena online! This free browser game turns every fender‚Äëbender into a shower of Lego‚Äëstyle blocks. Pick one of 80‚Äëplus rideable bricks, dive onto wild maps, and smack into rivals until their bumpers scatter across the asphalt. Each ding knocks parts clean off your car. Just as you used to play with your Lego cars when you were a kid. But here, a quick drift, mid‚Äëair spin, a cool stunt, or a healing kit will snap those blocks right back on.

With league shows, stadium soccer rounds, open‚Äëworld freedrive, classic lap races, survival showdowns, and high‚Äëscore hunts, there's always a new reason to floor it after school. Think Rocket League meets Demolition Derby, rebuilt out of toy bricks, and yes, it runs perfectly, right in your Chromebook.

Controls

Computers

  • Drive: W / A / S / D or arrow keys
  • Drift: C
  • Nitro: Shift
  • Jump: Space
  • Spin‚Äëflip: double‚Äëtap S or down arrow
  • Shoot cannon: E (after you grab one)
  • Pause: Esc

How to Play Carnage Battle Arena

  • Pick a mode. Want nonstop wrecks? Hop into Death Match. Craving laps? Try Racing. Need chill time? Freedrive lets you roam and practice tricks.
  • Drive over floating cannons to bolt a turret to your roof, or snag green healing kits to glue fallen blocks back in place.
  • Drifting corners or landing a 360¬∫ flip mid‚Äëair repairs damage and fills your boost bar, so show off.
  • Win, earn coins, unlock more rides. Each victory feeds your garage. Collect muscle cars and even a blocky school bus. And if you replace tires with giant ones, you can turn any vehicle in your garage into a monster truck.

Tips & Tricks

  • Drift on purpose. A quick tap of C around every corner keeps your health topped and fills nitro for the next straightaway.
  • Mid‚Äëair spins matter. Double‚Äëpress S just before a jump; a donut drift not only looks cool but can fully repair your car.
  • Soccer tricks. In football mode, ramming the ball with nitro gives it extra lift, which is perfect for top‚Äëcorner shots.
  • Survival smarts. Hide behind wrecks until only a few cars remain, then grab a cannon and finish the job.
  • Map memory. Healing kits respawn at fixed spots. Learn the locations and loop through them like a health circuit.

Developer

Carnage Battle Arena is built by BoomBit S.A.

Features

  • Block‚Äëby‚Äëblock damage: every crash pops bricks off your ride, so you literally watch your health fall to the pavement.
  • Six core modes: League, Football Challenges, Racing, Survival, Score Battle, Freedrive.
  • 82 unlockable vehicles: from tiny go‚Äëkarts to chunky tanks, each with unique brick shapes.
  • Dozens of arenas & tracks: city streets, desert bowls, stunt parks, even a giant football stadium.
  • Easy healing tricks: drift, spin, or catch power‚Äëups to snap your car back together without pit stops.
  • Cannon pickups: run over a glowing crate to mount rapid‚Äëfire blasters and turn the race into a shoot‚Äëout.

More Online Car Crash Games You'll Love

If you're into demolition derby-style car games, we have loads of options. on our Crash Games online tag. In case you're into kart racing with some shooting, next play Smash Karts to dig the cannon pickups. All of our crash and smash games run right in your browser and keep the "drive, destroy, repeat" vibe rolling after Carnage Battle Arena.

name: A Small World Cup
description:
Forget all those other soccer games where players throw the ball toward the goalposts. This time, we're throwing the players at the ball and crossing our fingers it somehow turns into a goal! A Small World Cup is a funny 2 player soccer game with pixelated visuals where the players (yes, the ragdoll ones) do all the heavy lifting... or slamming. Instead of carefully lining up a shot, you'll aim your ragdoll footballer, pull back, and release for a full-speed dive at the ball. It's chaotic, it's funny, and it's as unpredictable as it sounds! Prepare to laugh, strategize (kind of), and accidentally score on yourself‚Äîbecause in this game, anything can happen! You can pick your national team and compete in 1v1 matches to win cups like the Euro Cup 2024, World Cup, America Cup and more.

Controls

For Computers:

  • Hold LMB to aim, release to send

For Mobiles:

  • Tap and hold to aim release to send

How to Play A Small World Cup

  • Pick from 8 glorious tournaments: World Cup Classic, World Cup 2022, Euro Cup 2024, America Cup, or dive into club territory with options like Euro Clubs, Italian Clubs, English Clubs, and Other Clubs.
  • Pick your mode: normal or golden goal.
    • Normal Mode: Classic 45-second matches to prove you're the best‚Äîor bump it to 90 seconds if you like dragging out your victories.
    • Golden Goal Mode: One goal wins it all. Quick, brutal, and perfect for those who live on the edge.
  • Choose from a range of countries, and don't worry‚Äîyour choice just changes the shirt color, not your skill level. The game then kindly assigns you a random opponent who is equally as clueless.

When the Match Starts

  • Hit the start and let the madness begin! It's a 1v1 showdown where YOU are the offense and the defense.

name: Drift Boss
description:
Say hi to an easily controlled and captivating game! Drift Boss is a 3D driving game where you steer your little car over sharp bends. No brakes are holding you. Drift through the corners and swing into high gear. The aim is to drive as long as possible without falling into space. Drift Boss makes such a deep addiction that you will be surprised how simple mechanics make this possible. Don't forget to share your highest score with us in the comment section below!

How to Play Drift Boss?

  • Hit the start button and activate a booster if you have one.
  • Press the spacebar (or left click) to turn right and release the control to turn left.
  • The path you drive on has no ends, so you set your own goals.
  • Beat your highest score, or challenge your friends and be the boss of drifting!

Drift Like a Boss: Boosters

Three kinds of boosters are available in Drift Boss: Double score, car insurance, and coin rush. You can activate the boosters for only one run, and they will make your run easier for a while. You need to set the booster before driving.

  • Car Insurance: This booster will insure your car for one fall in a run. If you fall into space, you can continue where you left off by using your insurance.
  • Double Score: This will double your score through the run.
  • Coin Rush: This booster will fill your roads with coins. A great option if you are planning to buy a new vehicle.

How do I earn boosters in Drift Boss?

  • you can buy them with your coinsüí∞
  • you can turn the spin wheel and cross your fingers for the best üé∞
  • check in every day to take daily prizesüéÅ

Need Some Tips?

Here are the tips and tricks for Drift Boss:

  • Don't steer too early. Wait until when you are close to the bend, then make your turn.
  • Are you frustrated falling down over and over? Try to buy a new vehicle; more expensive cars have better grip. Then, you will enjoy a longer ride without thinking about the sliding distance.
  • You can turn your car on the air if you come across a bend right after jumping.
  • Remember to get your daily rewards and practice. You will soon be an Ultimate Drift Boss!

Features

  • Easy controls and simple mechanics
  • Daily rewards and spin wins
  • Different boosters available
  • Range of vehicles to unlock
  • Mobile compatible
  • Completely free to play

Controls

  • Desktop: Press space or left click to turn right, release to steer left
  • Mobile: Touch and hold the screen to turn right, and release it to turn left

Developer

Drift Boss was created by MarketJS.

Similar Games

Fan of endless games like Drift Boss? Head over to the Endless Games tag to find more. Electron Dash is another game for the ones who trust their reflexes. Try it out, and let us know your opinions in the comments.

name: Idle Breakout
description:
Idle Breakout is a free online clicker game with arcade mechanics. The aim is to break all the bricks in a room. With hundreds of levels, this brick-breaker game provides endless gameplay. Click on the bricks or employ balls. Upgrade balls' power and speed, use lasers, and get all the ribbons! When you pass all the levels, proceed to the next prestige to be an ultimate brickbreaker!

How to Play Idle Breakout

  • Start destroying blocks by clicking on them.
  • When you have enough coins, buy a basic ball from the top left.
  • Upgrade balls, use power-ups and pass as many levels as you can.
  • The number on the brick indicates how many times it needs to be hit to break. As you pass more and more levels, you will see much higher numbers on bricks. So you should increase the clicking power, as well.

Balls

In the game, you can acquire balls using your coins. Whenever you get the first ball of each type, a new type of ball unlocks.

In addition, you can improve your balls' speed range and power. Max them up in the Upgrades section. Learn about the types of balls below.

  • Basic: Very slow and ineffective alone. Upgrade the speed and power of the ball and employ a number of them to get results from the basic ball
  • Plasma: Much faster than the basic ball, it will cause splash damage to bricks. You should improve its range.
  • Sniper: Bounces of Walls towards the nearest brick. Fast and powerful.
  • Scatter Ball: $10000 to unlock the first one. Creates additional single-hit balls. Very effective in cleaning the rooms.
  • Cannon Ball: Smashes through bricks and vital after 2nd and 3rd prestige.
  • Poison Ball: The last ball to unlock. When a poison ball hits a brick, the brick becomes infected and takes double the damage from any other ball.

Achievements

The achievement section will guide you on what to aim for in the game. There are 12 of them that you can acquire.

  • 1 million total damage with basic ball
  • 1 million total damage with plasma
  • 1 million total damage with sniper
  • 1 million total damage with cannonball
  • 1 million total damage with poison ball
  • Use all power-ups.
  • Prestige 5 times.
  • Have 10 of each ball.
  • Break 1.000 black bricks.
  • Reach level 250
  • Unlock all 4 lasers.
  • Break 1 million bricks.

Power-Ups

You have 5 power-ups that you can use throughout the game. Except for the x2 Gold power-up, they all boost the brick-breaking performance for 30 seconds. Access them in the upgrades section as well.

  • Cashed Up: Earn double the money.
  • Click Frenzy: Clicks spawn scatter balls or do x10 damage.
  • Demon Core: Deals waves of damage. Very effective and lets you pass a few levels at once.
  • Snow Ball: Gains power and speed with every bounce.
  • 2X Gold: Can only be used on a gold brick

Save Progress in Idle Breakout

You haven't played Idle Breakout for hours, only to lose your progress when you close the tab. Your progress is saved in your browser cache, so you can continue where you left off next time and enjoy some passive income in the game.

By any chance, if you'd like to save the progress locally and delete your browser history, head over to the settings section and click export to back up your progress. Copy the code given in the pop-up. Import by pasting the same code the next time you enter the game.

Controls

Computers

  • Left-click on bricks to break

Mobile and Tablet

  • Tap on bricks to break

Developer

Kodiqi made Idle Breakout.

What to Play Next?

Check out our newest release if you enjoy playing idle games like this. Spacebar Clicker is a game in which you employ boomer moms and booster monkeys to press the spacebar. It's absolutely absurd and a fun way to waste some time while waiting for a meeting to end or a bus to arrive at your stop. We hope you have fun playing the games we offer. If you have any inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us!

name: Burnout City

Chasing thrills, pulling off insane drifts, dodging the fuzz in epic mafia-style chases and many other challenges await you!

How to Play Burnout City

  • With 11 vehicles, from monstrous trucks to sleek F1 cars, pick the beast that matches your style.
  • Peek into the garage to scope out each car's stats and upgrade potential. Need for speed? Seek a lightweight car like the Porsche 993. Prefer engine power on those hills? Monster Truck comes to the help. Or Would you like to master maneuvers on those tight turns? Then, stick with a car with extreme handling performance.

Customization Options

Next, head to the customization menu and make your car scream your personality. Explore them all, from slick paint jobs to neon underglow. You have an unlimited supply of in-game currency, so make sure your car stands out without any budget concerns. If you run out of money, simply go back to the main menu and click "add money" button. It's like magic! A car game cheat has never been this obvious. So, go all out to enjoy your ride! Here's what you've got in the customization menu:

  • Paint: From matte black to neon green, paint your ride to reflect your soul.
  • Wheels: Choose rims that spin right or wide or just look downright wild.
  • Mechanic: Tune your cambers, suspension, and brakes. Make every part sing your tune.
  • Upgrades: Max out your car's potential. Leave no part left behind.
  • Spoilers: Add some air to your flair. Make your car cut through the wind and look cool doing it.
  • Decals: Slap on some street cred with decals that just look rad.
  • Neons: Light up the night with underglow that turns heads and lights up the streets. Pro Gamer Tip: neon lights look awesome, especially on the Midnight City map.

Game Modes

After picking your car and upgrading it to its full potential, enter the map. You'll see multiple circles, each presenting a game mode. Drive over the circle to enter that game mode. You have 5 game mode options. You've got Race Mode to outpace AI for glory, Pursuit Mode to chase down a nemesis, Trailblazer for precision cone hitting, Checkpoints for a timed challenge, and Free Ride for mission-free and stunt-filled exploration.

name: Religious Idle
description:
Forge a fresh faith and watch it bloom! Religious Idle is a free online idle game that lets you start a brand-new religion from a single believer and grow it into a globe-spanning movement (and you won't need to part seas to make it happen!) How to Play Religious Idle

Build Holy Ground

Followers tithe automatically, so keep an eye on the green money counter. Spend cash on buildings that scale your reach:

  • Gathering Spot ‚Üí Shrine ‚Üí House of Worship ‚Üí Mega Temple ‚Üí Divine Monument.
  • Each tier increases follower capacity and unlocks new gameplay layers but you'll need to assign praichers to build temples.

Train Your Zealots

With bigger buildings come dedicated roles. Assign unclaimed zealots as:

  • Recruiters: bring in 1% extra believers each cycle.
  • Fundraisers: squeeze a few extra coins from every tithe.
  • Preachers: keep the faith alive inside large structures such as worship houses and mega temples.
  • Crusaders: they'll embark on expeditions for precious relics. Relics act like power-ups: double XP, speed up tithes, or flood your roster with bonus zealots. Use them wisely for explosive growth.

Explore Mail Feed

Pop open the little envelope in the corner and you'll find a stream of quirky headlines, miracle reports, and fan or foe letters. It's like Twitter for prophets. World news flashes like "The Sign of Maneizm Appears on a Piece of Toast in Georgia" or "Children Everywhere Look Forward to Annual Holy Day." These short blurbs hint at your creed's growing cultural footprint. Followers gush about everyday blessings, from finding lost keys to a balding believer who swears his hair grew back once he started tithing. Each feel-good story boosts the impact. And not everyone's on board. Expect the odd grumpy letter about loud chanting at 3 a.m. or worries that your zealots are getting "too enthusiastic." Negative press may slow recruitment, so keep the faithful happy.

Developer

Religious Idle is crafted by Kodiqi, the indie studio behind several cult-favorite clicker titles. Their trademark: clean UI, steady progression, and clever humor that keeps you grinning between clicks.

More Idle Clicker Games You'll Love

If watching followers and funds snowball made your day, fire up Logistics Inc next. This free online game swaps holy buildings for delivery vehicles, letting you recruit staff, juggle budgets, and scale a transport empire from ten bucks to market dominance. Play now for free on OnlineGames.io!

name: War of Tanks Paper Note
description:
Grab your favorite doodle pen and dive straight into War of Tanks Paper Note. It's a free online tank game that looks like it was drawn during a very boring math class cuz this game is so FUN! Every line, laser fence, and armored turret is sketched on squared notebook paper. The action feels as intense as any full-blown arcade shooter. You'll guide a tiny hand-colored tank through mazes of spinning barriers, pencil-red laser grids, and enemy doodles that won't hesitate to erase you from the page. Plus, you can play against a friend on the same keyboard. This free game is wrapped in fun in a charming paper-craft style that makes the battlefield feel both nostalgic and brand-new.

Controls

Purple Tank (Player 1)

  • Move W / A / S / D
  • Shoot Space
  • Restart R

Green Tank (Player 2)

  • Move Arrow Keys
  • Shoot M
  • Restart R

How to Play War of Tanks Paper Note

Choose between 1 P and 2 P on the title page. In single-player, you face an obstacle course broken into three main zones, each gated by glowing red laser doors. Destroy marked targets, tanks, turrets, or clusters of foot soldiers to shut those lasers down and unlock the next area. Your green health bar at the top left shows how much scribbled armor you have left. When it empties, your tank gets crunched into paper scraps and the run ends.

Solo Campaign

Each zone contains five high-value targets. Pick them off in any order while weaving through cross-shaped barriers and timing your moves past rotating cannons. Projectiles travel only in the direction your tank is facing, so line up your turret before shooting. Some walls are thin enough to fire through; others bounce shots back, turning the page into a ricochet puzzle. Clear all fifteen targets across the three zones to complete the mission and claim the ruler-of-the-paper-note title!

Grab Power-Ups

Colored icons dot the battlefield, each granting an instant upgrade when you roll over it. In two-player mode, these bonuses spawn more often, so snag them fast or watch your friend grab the upper hand.

  • Armor adds a chunk to your health bar, letting you soak up extra damage.
  • Repair fully restores your tank
  • Bigger Bullet boosts shell size for wider impact.
  • Triple Shots fires a spread of three doodle rounds at once.
  • Rocket swaps your standard shell for a fast, splash-damage missile.
  • Laser unleashes a piercing beam that carves clean lines through enemies.
  • Freeze temporarily locks every hostile unit in place
  • Laser Inactivation turns off certain red grids

Developer

War of Tanks Paper Note is created by NeplingameStudio.

name: Logistics Inc
description:
Ever dreamed of turning a tiny delivery startup into a globe-spanning shipping empire? Logistics Inc lets you do just that, right in your browser. This addictive online idle game starts you with five employees, $10, and a single bicycle courier. Build your fleet, manage staff, research upgrades, and dominate markets in this deep business simulator that's perfect for quick sessions or marathon strategy planning.

Controls

  • Mouse/Touch: Click or tap to play

How to Play

Start with one bicycle - buy it, assign staff, and watch orders roll in. Each completed delivery fills your status bar and bank account. Empty vehicles don't earn - always keep them staffed!

Expand Your Empire

Reinvest profits to unlock vans, trucks, planes, and ships. Higher tiers mean bigger orders but require more workers and cash. Balance expansion with hiring!

Research & Development

Assign workers to R&D to unlock game-changing upgrades like Efficiency boosts and Contractor hiring. Early investment pays exponential dividends!

Marketing Mastery

Keep orders flowing by assigning marketing staff to different vehicle types. Balance your team across product lines for steady income.

Maintenance Matters

Hire and train mechanics to keep vehicles at peak performance. Upskill them to handle advanced fleets as you expand.

Become a Tycoon

Use bulk purchases to scale rapidly. Optimize every department until your money counter spins endlessly. How many zeros can you add to your valuation?

Developed by Kodiqi. Try Idle Startup Tycoon for more business simulation fun!
